Generalizing to Unseen Domains: A Survey on Domain Generalization
泛化到未见领域：关于领域泛化的调研

Jindong Wang (C), Cuiling Lan (C), Chang Liu, Yidong Ouyang, Tao Qin (C), Senior Member, IEEE, Wang Lu (C), Yiqiang Chen (C), Senior Member, IEEE, Wenjun Zeng (C), Fellow, IEEE, and Philip S. Yu (C), Fellow, IEEE
王金东（通讯作者），兰翠菱（通讯作者），刘畅，欧阳毅东，秦涛（通讯作者），IEEE高级会员，王路（通讯作者），陈毅强（通讯作者），IEEE高级会员，曾文俊（通讯作者），IEEE会士，以及Philip S. Yu（通讯作者），IEEE会士
Abstract-Machine learning systems generally assume that the training and testing distributions are the same. To this end, a key requirement is to develop models that can generalize to unseen distributions. Domain generalization (DG), i.e., out-of-distribution generalization, has attracted increasing interests in recent years. Domain generalization deals with a challenging setting where one or several different but related domain(s) are given, and the goal is to learn a model that can generalize to an unseen test domain. Great progress has been made in the area of domain generalization for years. This paper presents the first review of recent advances in this area. First, we provide a formal definition of domain generalization and discuss several related fields. We then thoroughly review the theories related to domain generalization and carefully analyze the theory behind generalization. We categorize recent algorithms into three classes: data manipulation, representation learning, and learning strategy, and present several popular algorithms in detail for each category. Third, we introduce the commonly used datasets, applications, and our open-sourced codebase for fair evaluation. Finally, we summarize existing literature and present some potential research topics for the future.
摘要—机器学习系统通常假设训练和测试分布相同。为此，一个关键要求是开发能够泛化到未见分布的模型。领域泛化（DG），即分布外泛化，近年来引起了越来越多的关注。领域泛化处理的是一个具有挑战性的设置，其中一个或几个不同但相关的领域被给出，目标是学习一个能够泛化到未见测试领域的模型。在领域泛化领域已经取得了巨大进展。本文是这一领域近期进展的首次回顾。首先，我们提供了领域泛化的正式定义，并讨论了几个相关领域。然后，我们彻底回顾了与领域泛化相关的理论，并仔细分析了泛化背后的理论。我们将近期算法分为三类：数据操作、表征学习和学习策略，并详细介绍了每个类别中的几种流行算法。第三，我们介绍了常用的数据集、应用以及我们开源的代码库，以便公平评估。最后，我们总结了现有文献，并提出了未来一些潜在的研究课题。
Index Terms-Domain generalization, domain adaptation, transfer learning, out-of-distribution generalization.
索引术语—领域泛化，领域适应，迁移学习，分布外泛化。

I. INTRODUCTION
I. 引言

M a chine learning (ML) has achieved remarkable success in various areas, such as computer vision, natural language processing, and healthcare. The goal of ML is to design a model that can learn general and predictive knowledge from training data, and then apply the model to new (test) data. Traditional ML models are trained based on the i.i.d. assumption that training and testing data are identically and independently distributed. However, this assumption does not always hold in reality. When the probability distributions of training data and testing data are different, the performance of ML models often deteriorates due to domain distribution gaps [1]. Collecting the data of all possible domains to train ML models is expensive and even prohibitively impossible. Therefore, enhancing the generalization ability of ML models is important in both industry and academic fields.
机器学习（ML）在各个领域取得了显著的成功，例如计算机视觉、自然语言处理和医疗保健。ML的目标是设计一个模型，能够从训练数据中学习到通用和预测性知识，然后将该模型应用于新的（测试）数据。传统的ML模型是基于训练和测试数据同分布且独立同分布（i.i.d.）的假设进行训练的。然而，在现实中这一假设并不总是成立。当训练数据和测试数据的概率分布不同时，由于领域分布差异，ML模型的性能往往会下降 [1]。收集所有可能领域的数据来训练ML模型既昂贵甚至可能根本无法实现。因此，增强ML模型的一般化能力在工业和学术界都非常重要。
Fig. 1. Examples from the dataset PACS [2] for domain generalization. The training set is composed of images belonging to domains of sketch, cartoon, and art paintings. DG aims to learn a generalized model that performs well on the unseen target domain of photos.
图 1. 数据集 PACS [2] 中用于领域泛化的示例。训练集由属于草图、卡通和艺术绘画领域的图像组成。DG的目标是学习一个泛化模型，使其在未见过的目标领域照片上表现良好。
There are many generalization-related research topics such as domain adaptation, meta-learning, transfer learning, covariate shift, and so on. In recent years, Domain generalization (DG) has received much attention. As shown in Fig. 1, the goal of domain generalization is to learn a model from one or several different but related domains (i.e., diverse training datasets) that will generalize well on unseen testing domains. For instance, given a training set consisting of images coming from sketches, cartoon images and paintings, domain generalization requires to train a good machine learning model that has minimum prediction error in classifying images coming from natural images or photos, which are clearly having distinguished distributions from the images in training set. Over the past years, domain generalization has made significant progress in various areas such as computer vision and natural language processing. Despite the progress, there has not been a survey in this area that comprehensively introduces and summarizes its main ideas, learning algorithms and other related problems to provide research insights for the future.
有许多与泛化相关的研究主题，例如领域适应、元学习、迁移学习、协变量偏移等。近年来，领域泛化（DG）受到了广泛关注。如图1所示，领域泛化的目标是从事一个或几个不同但相关的领域（即多样化的训练数据集）中学习一个模型，使其能够在未见过的测试领域上表现良好。例如，给定一个由草图、卡通图像和绘画图像组成的训练集，领域泛化要求训练一个优秀的机器学习模型，该模型在分类来自自然图像或照片的图像时具有最小的预测误差，这些图像显然与训练集中的图像具有区分明显的分布。在过去几年中，领域泛化在计算机视觉和自然语言处理等多个领域取得了显著进展。尽管取得了进展，但尚未有对该领域进行全面介绍和总结其主要思想、学习算法以及其他相关问题的调查，以供未来研究提供洞察。
In this paper, we present the first survey on domain generalization to introduce its recent advances, with special focus on its formulations, theories, algorithms, research areas, datasets, applications, and future research directions. We hope that this survey can provide a comprehensive review for interested researchers and inspire more research in this and related areas.
在本文中，我们首次对领域泛化进行了调查，以介绍其最新进展，特别关注其定义、理论、算法、研究领域、数据集、应用和未来研究方向。我们希望这份调查能为感兴趣的科研人员提供全面的回顾，并激发对该领域及相关领域更多的研究。

There are several survey papers after the conference version of our paper, and they are significantly different from ours. Concurrently, Zhou et al. [3] also wrote a survey on DG, while their focus is in computer vision field. A more recent survey paper is on out-of-distribution (OOD) generalization by Shen et al. [4]. Their work focused on causality and stable neural networks. A related survey paper [5] is for OOD detection instead of building a working algorithm that can be applied to any unseen environments.
我们论文的会议版本之后有几篇综述文章，它们与我们的工作有显著不同。与此同时，周等人 [3] 也撰写了一篇关于领域泛化（DG）的综述，但他们的重点是在计算机视觉领域。另一篇较新的综述文章是关于分布外（OOD）泛化的，由沈等人 [4] 撰写。他们的工作专注于因果关系和稳定的神经网络。另一篇相关的综述文章 [5] 是关于OOD检测，而不是构建一个可以应用于任何未见环境的算法。
This paper is a heavily extended version of our previously accepted short paper at IJCAI-21 survey track (6 pages, included in the appendix file, which can be found on the Computer Society Digital Library at http://doi.ieeecomputersociety.org/ 10.1109/TKDE.2022.3178128). Compared to the short paper, this version makes the following extensions:
本文是我们之前在 IJCAI-21 调研轨道上被接受并发表的短文（6 页，包含在附录文件中，可在计算机学会数字图书馆找到，网址为 http://doi.ieeecomputersociety.org/ 10.1109/TKDE.2022.3178128）的深度扩展版本。与短文相比，本版本进行了以下扩展：
  • We present the theory analysis on domain generalization and the related domain adaptation.
    - 我们对领域泛化的理论分析以及相关的领域适应进行了阐述。
  • We substantially extend the methodology by adding new categories: e.g., causality-inspired methods, generative modeling for feature disentanglement, invariant risk minimization, gradient operation-based methods, and other learning strategies to comprehensively summarize these DG methods.
    - 我们通过添加新的类别（例如，因果启发方法、用于特征解耦的生成模型、不变风险最小化、基于梯度操作的方法以及其他学习策略）实质性地扩展了方法论，以全面总结这些领域泛化方法。
  • For all the categories, we broaden the analysis of methods by including more related algorithms, comparisons, and discussion. And we also include more recent papers (over 30% of new work).
    - 对于所有类别，我们通过包括更多相关算法、比较和讨论来扩大方法的分析范围。我们还纳入了更多近期论文（超过 30% 的新工作）。
  • We extend the scope of datasets and applications, and we also explore evaluation standards to domain generalization. Finally, we build an open-sourced codebase for DG research named DeepD G1 and conduct some analysis of the results on public datasets.
    - 我们扩展了数据集和应用范围，并探讨了领域泛化的评估标准。最后，我们为领域泛化研究构建了一个开源代码库，名为 DeepD G1，并在公共数据集上对结果进行了一些分析。

本文的组织结构如下。我们在第 II 节中阐述领域泛化问题，并讨论其与现有研究领域的关联。第 III 节介绍领域泛化的相关理论。在第 IV 节中，我们详细描述了一些代表性的领域泛化方法。在第 V 节中，我们展示了从传统设置扩展的一些新的领域泛化研究领域。第 VI 节介绍应用，第 VII 节介绍领域泛化的基准数据集。我们在第 VIII 节总结了现有工作的见解，并提出了一些可能的未来研究方向。最后，我们在第 IX 节中总结本文。

II. BACKGROUND
II. 背景

A. Formalization of Domain Generalization
A. 领域泛化的形式化

In this section, we introduce the notations and definitions used in this paper.
在本节中，我们介绍本文使用的符号和定义。
Definition 1 (Domain). Let X denote a nonempty input space and Y an output space. A domain is composed of data that are sampled from a distribution. We denote it as S= {(xi,yi)}i=1n∼PXY ,where x∈X⊂Rd,y∈Y⊂R denotes the label,and PXY denotes the joint distribution of the input sample and output label. X and Y denote the corresponding random variables.
定义1（领域）。令 X 表示非空输入空间，Y 表示输出空间。一个领域由从某个分布中抽取的数据组成。我们将其表示为 S= {(xi,yi)}i=1n∼PXY，其中 x∈X⊂Rd,y∈Y⊂R 表示标签，PXY 表示输入样本和输出标签的联合分布。X 和 Y 表示相应的随机变量。
Definition 2 (Domain Generalization). As shown in Fig. 2 ,in domain generalization,we are given M training (source) domains Strain ={Si∣i=1,…,M} where Si= {(xji,yji)}j=1ni denotes the i -th domain. The joint distributions between each pair of domains are different: PXYi≠PXYj,1≤ i≠j≤M . The goal of domain generalization is to learn a robust and generalizable predictive function h:X→Y from the M training domains to achieve a minimum prediction error on an unseen test domain Stest  (i.e., Stest  cannot be accessed in training and PXYtest ≠PXYi for i∈{1,…,M} ):
定义2（领域泛化）。如图2所示，在领域泛化中，我们给出了 M 个训练（源）领域 Strain ={Si∣i=1,…,M}，其中 Si= {(xji,yji)}j=1ni 表示第 i 个领域。每对领域之间的联合分布是不同的：PXYi≠PXYj,1≤ i≠j≤M。领域泛化的目标是从事 M 个训练领域中学习一个鲁棒且可泛化的预测函数 h:X→Y，以便在未见过的测试领域 Stest  上实现最小预测误差（即 Stest  在训练中无法访问，且 PXYtest ≠PXYi 对 i∈{1,…,M}）：
(1)minh⁡E(x,y)∈Stest [ℓ(h(x),y)]
where E is the expectation and ℓ(⋅,⋅) is the loss function.
其中 E 是期望，ℓ(⋅,⋅) 是损失函数。
We list the frequently used notations in Table I.
我们在表I中列出了常用的符号。

B. Related Research Areas
B. 相关研究领域

There are several research fields closely related to domain generalization, including but not limited to: transfer learning, domain adaptation, multi-task learning, multiple domain learning, meta-learning, lifelong learning, and zero-shot learning. We summarize their differences with domain generalization in Table II and briefly describe them in the following.
有几个研究领域与领域泛化密切相关，包括但不限于：迁移学习、领域适应、多任务学习、多领域学习、元学习、终身学习和零样本学习。我们在表II中总结了它们与领域泛化的区别，并在以下内容中简要描述它们。
Multi-task learning [7] jointly optimizes models on several related tasks. By sharing representations between these tasks, we could enable the model to generalize better on the original task. Note that multi-task learning does not aim to enhance the generalization to a new (unseen) task. Particularly, multi-domain learning is a kind of multi-task learning, which trains on multiple related domains to learn good models for each original domain [8] instead of new test domains.
多任务学习 [7] 联合优化模型在几个相关任务上。通过在这些任务之间共享表示，我们可以使模型在原始任务上更好地泛化。注意，多任务学习并不旨在增强对新（未见过的）任务的泛化。特别是，多域学习是一种多任务学习，它在多个相关域上训练，以学习每个原始域 [8] 的良好模型，而不是新的测试域。
1 https://github.com/jindongwang/transferlearning/tree/master/code/ DeepDG
TABLE II
COMPARISON BETWEEN DOMAIN GENERALIZATION AND SOME RELATED LEARNING PARADIGMS
域泛化与一些相关学习范式的比较
Learning paradigmTraining dataTest dataConditionTest access
Multi-task learningS1,⋯,SnS1,⋯,SnYi≠Yj,1≤i≠j≤n✓
Transfer learningSsrc , StarStarYsrc≠Ytar✓
Domain adaptationSsrc,StarStarP(Xsrc)≠P(Xtar)✓
Meta-learningS1,⋯,SnSn+1Yi≠Yj,1≤i≠j≤n+1✓
Lifelong learningS1,⋯,SnS1,⋯,SnSi arrives sequentially✓
Zero-shot learningS1,⋯,SnSn+1Yn+1≠Yi,1≤i≤n×
Domain generalizationS1,⋯,SnSn+1P(Si)≠P(Sj),1≤i≠j≤n+1×
Transfer learning [9], [10], [11] trains a model on a source task and aims to enhance the performance of the model on a different but related target domain/task. Pretraining-finetuning is the commonly used strategy for transfer learning where the source and target domains have different tasks and target domain is accessed in training. In DG, the target domain cannot be accessed and the training and test tasks are often the same while they have different distributions.
迁移学习 [9]、[10]、[11] 在源任务上训练模型，旨在提高模型在不同但相关的目标域/任务上的性能。预训练-微调是迁移学习中常用的策略，其中源域和目标域有不同的任务，且训练时可以访问目标域。在域泛化（DG）中，无法访问目标域，训练和测试任务通常是相同的，但它们的分布不同。
Domain adaptation (DA) [12], [13] is also popular in recent years. DA aims to maximize the performance on a given target domain using existing training source domain(s). The difference between DA and DG is that DA has access to the target domain data while DG cannot see them during training. This makes DG more challenging than DA but more realistic and favorable in practical applications.
域适应（DA）[12]、[13] 在近年来也非常流行。DA 旨在使用现有的训练源域来最大化给定目标域的性能。DA 与 DG 的区别在于，DA 可以访问目标域数据，而 DG 在训练期间无法看到它们。这使得 DG 比 DA 更具挑战性，但在实际应用中更加现实和有利。
Meta-learning [14], [15], [16] aims to learn the learning algorithm itself by learning from previous experience or tasks, i.e., learning-to-learn. While the learning tasks are different in meta-learning, the learning tasks are the same in domain generalization. Meta-learning is a general learning strategy that can be used for DG [17], [18], [19], [20] by simulating the meta-train and meta-test tasks in training domains to enhance the performance of DG.
元学习 [14]、[15]、[16] 旨在通过从以前的经验或任务中学习来学习学习算法本身，即学习-学习。虽然元学习中的学习任务不同，但在域泛化中学习任务是相同的。元学习是一种通用的学习策略，可以通过在训练域中模拟元训练和元测试任务来增强 DG 的性能 [17]、[18]、[19]、[20]。
Lifelong Learning [21], or continual learning, cares about the learning ability among multiple sequential domains/tasks. It requires the model to continually learn over time by accommodating new knowledge while retaining previously learned experiences. This is also different from DG since it can access the target domain in each time step, and it does not explicitly handle the different distributions across domains.
终身学习 [21]，或称持续学习，关注的是在多个顺序领域/任务之间的学习能力。它要求模型通过容纳新知识同时保留之前学到的经验，随着时间的推移持续学习。这也与DG不同，因为它在每个时间步都可以访问目标领域，并且它没有明确处理不同领域之间的分布差异。
Zero-shot learning [22], [23] aims at learning models from seen classes and classify samples whose categories are unseen in training. In contrast, domain generalization in general studies the problem where training and testing data are from the same classes but with different distributions.
零样本学习 [22]、[23] 旨在从已见类别学习模型，并对训练中未见类别的样本进行分类。相比之下，域泛化通常研究的问题是训练和测试数据来自相同的类别，但是分布不同。

III. THEORY
III. 理论

In this section, we review some theories related to domain generalization. Since domain adaptation is closely related to DG, we begin with the theory of domain adaptation.
在这一节中，我们回顾了一些与域泛化相关的理论。由于域适应与DG密切相关，我们从域适应的理论开始。

A. Domain Adaptation
A. 域适应

For a binary classification problem, we denote the true labeling functions on the source domain as h∗s:X→[0,1]2 and that on the target domain as h∗t . Let h:X→[0,1] be any classifier from a hypothesis space H . The classification difference on the source domain between two classifiers h and h′ can then be measured by
对于一个二分类问题，我们表示源域上的真实标记函数为 h∗s:X→[0,1]2，目标域上的为 h∗t。令 h:X→[0,1] 为来自假设空间 H 的任意分类器。两个分类器 h 和 h′ 在源域上的分类差异可以由以下测量
(2)ϵs(h,h′)=Ex∼PXs[h(x)≠h′(x)]=Ex∼PXs[|h(x)−h′(x)|],
and similarly we can define ϵt when taking x∼PXt in the expectation. We define ϵs(h):=ϵs(h,h∗s) and ϵt(h):=ϵt(h,h∗t) as the risk of classifier h on the source and target domains, respectively.
同样，当取 x∼PXt 时的期望，我们可以定义 ϵt。我们定义 ϵs(h):=ϵs(h,h∗s) 和 ϵt(h):=ϵt(h,h∗t) 分别为分类器 h 在源域和目标域上的风险。
The goal of DG/DA is to minimize the target risk ϵt(h) ,but it is not accessible since we do not have any information on h∗t . So people seek to bound the target risk ϵt(h) using the tractable source risk ϵs(h) . Ben-David et al. [24] (Thm. 1) give a bound relating the two risks:
DG/DA的目标是最小化目标风险 ϵt(h)，但由于我们没有任何关于 h∗t 的信息，所以它无法访问。因此，人们试图使用可操作的源风险 ϵs(h) 来界定目标风险 ϵt(h)。Ben-David等人 [24]（定理1）给出了两个风险之间的界限：
(3)ϵt(h)≤ϵs(h)+2d1(PXs,PXt)
(4)+minPX∈{PXs,PXt}⁡Ex∼PX[|h∗s(x)−h∗t(x)|]
where d1(PXs,PXt):=supA∈X⁡|PXs[A]−PXt[A]| is the total variation between the two distributions,and X denotes the sigma-field on X . The second term on the r.h.s measures the difference of cross-domain distributions, and the third term represents the difference in the labeling functions (covariate shift is not a priori assumed).
其中 d1(PXs,PXt):=supA∈X⁡|PXs[A]−PXt[A]| 表示两个分布之间的总变差，X 表示在 X 上的sigma-域。等式右边的第二项衡量跨域分布的差异，第三项表示标签函数的差异（不预先假设协变量偏移）。
However, the total variation is a strong distance (i.e., it tends to be very large) that may loosen the bound (4), and is hard to estimate using finite samples. To address this, Ben-David et al. [24] developed another bound ([24], Thm. 2; [25], Thm. 1):
然而，总变差是一个强距离（即，它往往非常大），可能会放宽界限（4），并且使用有限样本很难估计。为了解决这个问题，Ben-David等人[24]提出了另一个界限（[24]，定理2；[25]，定理1）：
(5)ϵt(h)≤ϵs(h)+dHΔH(PXs,PXt)+λH
where the HΔH -divergence is defined as dHΔH(PXs,PXt):= suph,h′∈H⁡|ϵs(h,h′)−ϵt(h,h′)| ,replacing the total variation d1 to measure the distribution difference, and the ideal joint risk λH:=infh∈H⁡[ϵs(h)+ϵt(h)] measures the complexity of H for the prediction tasks on the two domains. HΔH -divergence has a better finite-sample guarantee, leading to a non-asymptotic bound:
其中 HΔH -散度定义为 dHΔH(PXs,PXt):= suph,h′∈H⁡|ϵs(h,h′)−ϵt(h,h′)| ，取代总变差 d1 来衡量分布差异，理想联合风险 λH:=infh∈H⁡[ϵs(h)+ϵt(h)] 衡量 H 在两个域上的预测任务的复杂性。HΔH -散度在有限样本下有更好的保证，导致非渐进界限：
Theorem 1 (Domain Adaptation Error Bound (Non-Asymptotic) [24] (Thm. 2)). Let d be the Vapnik-Chervonenkis (VC) dimension [26] of H ,and Us and Ut be unlabeled samples of size n from the two domains. Then for any h∈H and δ∈(0,1) ,the following inequality holds with probability at least 1−δ :
定理1（域自适应误差界限（非渐进）[24]（定理2））。设 d 为 H 的Vapnik-Chervonenkis（VC）维数[26]，Us 和 Ut 分别为来自两个域的未标记样本，大小为 n。那么对于任意的 h∈H 和 δ∈(0,1)，以下不等式至少以 1−δ 的概率成立：
(6)ϵt(h)≤ϵs(h)+d^HΔH(Us,Ut)+λH
(7)+42dlog⁡(2n)+log⁡(2/δ)n
2 When the output is in (0,1) ,it means the probability of y=1 .
2 当输出在 (0,1) 时，意味着 y=1 的概率。
where d^HΔH(Us,Ut) is the estimate of dHΔH(PXs,PXt) on the two sets of finite data samples.
其中 d^HΔH(Us,Ut) 是在两组有限数据样本上对 dHΔH(PXs,PXt) 的估计。
In the above bounds, the domain distribution difference d(PXs,PXt) is not controllable,but one may learn a representation function g:X→Z that maps the original input data x to some representation space Z ,so that the representation distributions of the two domains become closer. This direction of DA is thus called DA based on domain-invariant representation (DA-DIR). The theory of domain-invariant representations has since inspired many DA/DG methods, which can be seen in Section IV-B.
在上述界限中，领域分布差异 d(PXs,PXt) 是不可控的，但可以学习一个表示函数 g:X→Z 将原始输入数据 x 映射到某个表示空间 Z，以便两个领域的表示分布变得更为接近。因此，这个方向的DA被称为基于领域不变表示的DA（DA-DIR）。领域不变表示的理论此后启发了许多DA/DG方法，这在第IV-B节中有所体现。

B. Domain Generalization
B. 领域泛化

1) Average Risk Estimation Error Bound: The first line of domain generalization theory considers the case where the target domain is totally unknown (not even unsupervised data), and measures the average risk over all possible target domains. Assume that all possible target distributions follow an underlying hyper-distribution P on (x,y) distributions: PXYt∼P ,and that the source distributions also follow the same hyper-distribution: PXY1,…,PXYM∼P . For generalization to any possible target domain, the classifier to be learned in this case also includes the domain information PX into its input,so prediction is in the form y=h(PX,x) on the domain with distribution PXY . For such a classifier h ,its average risk over all possible target domains is then given by:
1) 平均风险估计误差界限：领域泛化理论的第一个方面考虑了目标领域完全未知（甚至没有无监督数据）的情况，并衡量了所有可能目标领域的平均风险。假设所有可能的目标分布遵循一个在 (x,y) 分布上的潜在超分布 P：PXYt∼P，并且源分布也遵循相同的超分布：PXY1,…,PXYM∼P。为了泛化到任何可能的目标领域，在这种情况下要学习的分类器还需要将领域信息 PX 包含在其输入中，因此预测形式为 y=h(PX,x) 在分布为 PXY 的领域中。对于这样的分类器 h，其在所有可能目标领域上的平均风险可以表示为：
(8)E(h):=EPXY∼PE(x,y)∼PXY[ℓ(h(PX,x),y)]
where ℓ is a loss function on Y . Exactly evaluating the expectations is impossible, but we can estimate it using finite domains/distributions following P ,and finite (x,y) samples following each distribution. As we have assumed PXY1,…,PXYM∼P ,the source domains and supervised data could serve for this estimation:
其中 ℓ 是在 Y 上的损失函数。精确计算期望是不可能的，但我们可以使用遵循 P 的有限领域/分布以及每个分布下的有限 (x,y) 样本来估计它。由于我们已经假设 PXY1,…,PXYM∼P，源领域和监督数据可以用于这个估计：
(9)E^(h):=1M∑i=1M⁡1ni∑j=1ni⁡ℓ(h(Ui,xji),yji),
where we use the supervised dataset Ui:={xji∣(xji,yji)∈Si} from domain i as an empirical estimation for PXi .
其中我们使用来自领域 i 的监督数据集 Ui:={xji∣(xji,yji)∈Si} 作为 PXi 的经验估计。
The first problem to consider is how well such an estimate approximates the target E(h) . This can be measured by the largest difference between E(h) and E^(h) on some space of h . To our knowledge,this is first analyzed by Blanchard et al. [6],where the space of h is taken as a reproducing kernel Hilbert space (RKHS). However, different from common treatment,the classifier h here also depends on the distribution PX ,so the kernel defining the RKHS should be in the form k¯((PX1,x1),(PX2,x2)) . Blanchard et al. [6] construct such a kernel using kernels kX,kX′ on X and kernel κ on the RKHS HkX′ of kernel kX′:k~((PX1,x1),(PX2,x2)):= κ(ΨkX′(PX1),ΨkX′(PX2))kX(x1,x2), where ΨkX′(PX):= Ex∼PX[kX′(x,⋅)]∈HkX′ is the kernel embedding of distribution PX via kernel k′ . The result is given in the following theorem, which gives a bound on the largest average risk estimation error within an origin-centered closed ball BHk¯(r) of radius r in the RKHS Hk¯ of kernel k¯ ,in a slightly simplified case where n1=⋯=nM=:n .
首先需要考虑的问题是这种估计值如何近似目标 E(h) 。这可以通过在某个 h 空间上 E(h) 与 E^(h) 之间的最大差异来衡量。据我们所知，这是由 Blanchard 等人首次分析 [6]，其中 h 的空间被取为再生核希尔伯特空间（RKHS）。然而，与常见的处理方法不同，这里的分类器 h 也依赖于分布 PX ，因此定义 RKHS 的核应该具有 k¯((PX1,x1),(PX2,x2)) 的形式。Blanchard 等人 [6] 通过在 X 上的核 kX,kX′ 和 RKHS HkX′ 上的核 κ 构造了这样的核，其中 RKHS HkX′ 是核 kX′:k~((PX1,x1),(PX2,x2)):= 的 κ(ΨkX′(PX1),ΨkX′(PX2))kX(x1,x2), ，ΨkX′(PX):= Ex∼PX[kX′(x,⋅)]∈HkX′ 是通过核 k′ 对分布 PX 进行核嵌入。结果在以下定理中给出，该定理为在核 k¯ 的 RKHS Hk¯ 中，以原点为中心、半径为 r 的闭球内，最大平均风险估计误差提供了一个界限，在 n1=⋯=nM=:n 的稍微简化的情况下。
Theorem 2 (Average Risk Estimation Error Bound for Binary Classification [6]). Assume that the loss function ℓ is Lℓ -Lipschitz in its first argument and is bounded by Bℓ . Assume also that the kernels kX,kX′ and κ are bounded by Bk2,Bk′2≥1 and Bκ2 ,respectively,and the canonical feature map Φκ:v∈ HkX′↦κ(v,⋅)∈Hκ of κ is Lκ -Hölder of order α∈(0,1] on the closed ball BHk′(Bk′).3 Then for any r>0 and δ∈(0,1) , with probability at least 1−δ ,it holds that:
定理2（二分类的平均风险估计误差界[6]）。假设损失函数 ℓ 在其第一个参数上是 Lℓ -Lipschitz连续的，并且有界于 Bℓ 。还假设核函数 kX,kX′ 和 κ 分别有界于 Bk2,Bk′2≥1 和 Bκ2 ，并且 κ 的标准特征映射 Φκ:v∈ HkX′↦κ(v,⋅)∈Hκ 在闭球 BHk′(Bk′).3 上是 Lκ -Hölder连续的，阶数为 α∈(0,1] 。那么对于任意的 r>0 和 δ∈(0,1) ，在至少 1−δ 的概率下，以下成立：
(10)suph∈BHk¯(r)⁡|E^(h)−E(h)|≤C(Bℓ−M−1log⁡δ
(11)+rBkLℓ(Bk′Lκ(n−1log⁡(M/δ))α/2+Bκ/M)),
where C is a constant.
其中 C 是一个常数。
The bound becomes larger in general if (M,n) is replaced with (1,Mn) . It indicates that using domain-wise datasets is better than just pooling them into one mixed dataset, so the domain information plays a role. This result is later extended in [27], and Deshmukh et al. [28] give a bound for multi-class classification in a similar form.
如果用 (1,Mn) 替换 (M,n) ，则界限通常会变大。这表明使用域特定数据集比仅仅将它们混合成一个数据集要好，因此域信息起着作用。这个结果在 [27] 中得到了扩展，Deshmukh等人[28]给出了一个类似形式的多分类界限。
2) Generalization Risk Bound: Another line of DG theory considers the risk on a specific target domain, under the assumption of covariate shift (i.e.,the labeling function h∗ or PY∣X is the same over all domains). This measurement is similar to what is considered in domain adaptation theory in Section III-A, so we adopt the same definition for the source risks ϵ1,…,ϵM and the target risk ϵt . With the covariate shift assumption, each domain is characterized by the distribution on X . Albuquerque et al. [102] then consider approximating the target domain distribution PXt within the convex hull of source domain distributions: Λ:={∑i=1M⁡πiPXi∣π∈ΔM} ,where ΔM is the (M−1) -dimensional simplex so that each π represents a normalized mixing weights. Similar to the domain adaptation case,distribution difference is measured by the H -divergence to include the influence of the classifier class.
2) 泛化风险界限：另一条 DG 理论的线索考虑在特定目标域上的风险，假设协变量转移（即，标记函数 h∗ 或 PY∣X 在所有域上相同）。这个度量与第 III-A 节中域适应理论所考虑的相似，因此我们为源风险 ϵ1,…,ϵM 和目标风险 ϵt 采用了相同的定义。在协变量转移假设下，每个域由 X 上的分布特征化。Albuquerque 等人 [102] 接着考虑在源域分布的凸包内近似目标域分布 PXt ：Λ:={∑i=1M⁡πiPXi∣π∈ΔM}，其中 ΔM 是 (M−1) 维单形，因此每个 π 表示归一化的混合权重。与域适应情况类似，分布差异通过 H 散度来测量，以包含分类器类别的影响。
Theorem 3 (Domain Generalization Error Bound [102]). Let γ:=minπ∈ΔM⁡dH(PXt,∑i=1M⁡πiPXi) with minimizer π∗4 be the distance of PXt from the convex hull Λ ,and PX∗:= ∑i=1M⁡πi∗PXi be the best approximator within Λ . Let ρ:= supPX′,PX′′∈Λ⁡dH(PX′,PX′′) be the diameter of Λ . Then it holds that
定理 3（域泛化误差界限 [102]）。设 γ:=minπ∈ΔM⁡dH(PXt,∑i=1M⁡πiPXi) 以最小化器 π∗4 为 PXt 到凸包 Λ 的距离，PX∗:= ∑i=1M⁡πi∗PXi 是 Λ 内的最佳近似器。设 ρ:= supPX′,PX′′∈Λ⁡dH(PX′,PX′′) 为 Λ 的直径。则有
(12)ϵt(h)≤∑i=1M⁡πi∗ϵi(h)+γ+ρ2+λH,(PXt,PX∗),
where λH,(PXt,PX∗) is the ideal joint risk across the target domain and the domain with the best approximator distribution PX∗ .
其中 λH,(PXt,PX∗) 是目标域和具有最佳近似分布的域的理想联合风险 PX∗。
3 This means that for any u,v∈BHk′(BHk′) ,it holds that ∥Φκ(u)− Φκ(v)∥≤Lκ∥u−v∥α ,where the norms are of the respective RKHSs.
3 这意味着对于任何 u,v∈BHk′(BHk′)，都成立 ∥Φκ(u)− Φκ(v)∥≤Lκ∥u−v∥α，其中范数是各自 RKHS 的。
4 The original presentation does not mention that the π is the minimizer,but the proof indicates so.
4 原始表述没有提到 π 是最小化器，但证明暗示了这一点。
Fig. 3. Taxonomy of domain generalization methods.
图 3. 域泛化方法的分类。
The result can be seen as the generalization of domain adaptation bounds in Section III-A when there are multiple source domains. Again similar to the domain adaptation case, this bound motivates domain generalization methods based on domain invariant representation, which simultaneously minimize the risks over all source domains corresponding to the first term of the bound, as well as the representation distribution differences among source and target domains in the hope to reduce γ and ρ on the representation space. To sum up, the theory of generalization is an active research area and other researchers also derived different DG theory bounds using informativeness [167] and adversarial training [28], [98], [102], [167].
结果可以看作是在第III-A节中，当存在多个源域时，域自适应边界的泛化。类似于域自适应的情况，这个边界促使基于域不变表征的域泛化方法，这些方法同时最小化对应于边界第一项的所有源域的风险，以及源域和目标域之间表征分布的差异，希望能够减少 γ 和 ρ 在表征空间上的影响。总之，泛化理论是一个活跃的研究领域，其他研究者也使用信息性 [167] 和对抗训练 [28]、[98]、[102]、[167] 推导了不同的域泛化理论边界。

IV. Methodology
IV. 方法论

In this section, we introduce existing domain generalization methods in detail. As shown in Fig. 3, we categorize them into three groups, namely:
在这一节中，我们详细介绍了现有的域泛化方法。如图3所示，我们将它们分为三类，即：
1) Data manipulation: This category of methods focuses on manipulating the inputs to assist learning general representations. Along this line, there are two kinds of popular techniques: a). Data augmentation, which is mainly based on augmentation, randomization, and transformation of input data; b). Data generation, which generates diverse samples to help generalization.
1) 数据操作：这类方法专注于操作输入数据以辅助学习通用表征。沿着这条线，有两种流行的技术：a). 数据增强，主要基于输入数据的增强、随机化和转换；b). 数据生成，生成多样化的样本以帮助泛化。
2) Representation learning: This category of methods is the most popular in domain generalization. There are two representative techniques: a). Domain-invariant representation learning, which performs kernel, adversarial training, explicitly feature alignment between domains, or invariant risk minimization to learn domain-invariant representations; b). Feature disentanglement, which tries to disentangle the features into domain-shared or domain-specific parts for better generalization.
2) 表征学习：这类方法在域泛化中最为流行。有两种代表性技术：a). 域不变表征学习，通过执行核方法、对抗训练、域间特征对齐或不变风险最小化来学习域不变表征；b). 特征解耦，试图将特征分解为域共享部分或域特定部分，以实现更好的泛化。
3) Learning strategy: This category of methods focuses on exploiting the general learning strategy to promote the generalization capability, which mainly includes several kinds of methods: a). Ensemble learning, which relies on the power of ensemble to learn a unified and generalized predictive function; b). Meta-learning, which is based on the learning-to-learn mechanism to learn general knowledge by constructing meta-learning tasks to simulate domain shift; c). Gradient operation, which tries to learn generalized representations by directly operating on gradients; d). Distributionally robust optimization, which learns the worst-case distribution scenario of training domains; e). Self-supervised learning, which constructs pretext tasks to learn generalized representations. Additionally, there are other learning strategy that can be used for DG.
3) 学习策略：这类方法专注于利用一般学习策略来提升泛化能力，主要包括以下几种方法：a) 集成学习，它依赖于集成的力量来学习一个统一且泛化的预测函数；b) 元学习，它基于学习-学习机制，通过构建元学习任务来模拟领域迁移，学习一般知识；c) 梯度操作，它试图通过直接在梯度上操作来学习泛化表征；d) 分布鲁棒优化，它学习训练领域的最坏情况分布场景；e) 自监督学习，它构建预任务来学习泛化表征。此外，还有其他的学习策略可以用于域泛化。
These three categories of approaches are conceptually different. They are complementary to each other and can be combined towards higher performance. We will describe the approaches for each category in detail hereafter.
这三种方法在概念上是不同的。它们相互补充，可以结合起来以达到更高的性能。我们将在此后详细描述每个类别的方法。

A. Data Manipulation
A. 数据操作

We are always hungry for more training data in machine learning (ML). The generalization performance of a ML model often relies on the quantity and diversity of the training data. Given a limited set of training data, data manipulation is one of the cheapest and simplest way to generate samples so as to enhance the generalization capability of the model. The main objective for data manipulation-based DG is to increase the diversity of existing training data using different data manipulation methods. At the same time, the data quantity is also increased. Although the theoretical insight for why data augmentation or generation techniques can enhance the generalization ability of a model, experiments by Adila and Kang [168] showed that the model tend to make predictions for both OOD and in-distribution samples based on trivial syntactic heuristics for NLP tasks.
我们在机器学习（ML）中总是渴望更多的训练数据。ML模型的泛化性能往往依赖于训练数据的数量和多样性。在给定的有限训练数据集下，数据操作是生成样本以增强模型泛化能力最便宜、最简单的方法之一。基于数据操作的女儿泛化（DG）的主要目标是通过不同的数据操作方法增加现有训练数据的多样性。同时，数据量也增加了。尽管对于为什么数据增强或生成技术能够增强模型的泛化能力有理论上的洞察，但Adila和Kang [168]的实验表明，模型倾向于基于简单的句法启发式方法对NLP任务中的OOD和分布内样本进行预测。
We formulate the general learning objective of data manipulation-based DG as:
我们将基于数据操作的女儿泛化（DG）的一般学习目标公式化为：
(13)minh⁡Ex,y[ℓ(h(x),y)]+Ex′,y[ℓ(h(x′),y)]
where x′=M(x) denotes the manipulated data using a function M(⋅) . Based on the difference on this function,we further categorize existing work into two types: data augmentation and data generation.
其中 x′=M(x) 表示使用函数 M(⋅) 操作的数据。基于这个函数的差异，我们进一步将现有工作分为两类：数据增强和数据生成。
1) Data Augmentation-Based DG: Augmentation is one of the most useful techniques for training machine learning models. Typical augmentation operations include flipping, rotation, scaling, cropping, adding noise, and so on. They have been widely used in supervised learning to enhance the generalization performance of a model by reducing overfitting [36], [169]. Without exception,they can also be adopted for DG where M(⋅) can be instantiated as these data augmentation functions.
1) 基于数据增强的DG：增强是训练机器学习模型最有用的技术之一。典型的增强操作包括翻转、旋转、缩放、裁剪、添加噪声等。它们已被广泛用于监督学习，通过减少过拟合来提高模型的泛化性能 [36]，[169]。毫无疑问，它们也可以用于DG，其中 M(⋅) 可以实例化为这些数据增强函数。
a) Domain Randomization: Other than typical augmentation, domain randomization is an effective technique for data augmentation. It is commonly done by generating new data that can simulate complex environments based on the limited training samples. Here,the M(⋅) function is implemented as several manual transformations (commonly used in image data) such as: altering the location and texture of objects, changing the number and shape of objects, modifying the illumination and camera view, and adding different types of random noise to the data. Tobin et al. [32] first used this method to generate more training data from the simulated environment for generalization in the real environment. Similar techniques were also used in [29], [33], [34], [35] to strengthen the generalization capability of the models. Prakash et al. [30] further took into account the structure of the scene when randomly placing objects for data generation, which enables the neural network to learn to utilize context when detecting objects. Peng et al. [58] proposed to not only augment features, but also labels. It is easy to see that by randomization, the diversity of samples can be increased. But randomization is often random, indicating that there could be some useless randomizations that could be further removed to improve the efficiency of the model.
a) 领域随机化：除了典型的增强操作，领域随机化是数据增强的一种有效技术。它通常通过生成能够模拟复杂环境的新数据来实现，基于有限的训练样本。在这里，M(⋅) 函数实现为几种手动转换（通常用于图像数据），例如：改变物体的位置和纹理、改变物体的数量和形状、调整光照和摄像头视角，以及向数据添加不同类型的随机噪声。Tobin等人首次使用这种方法从模拟环境中生成更多的训练数据，以便在真实环境中泛化 [32]。类似的技术也在 [29]，[33]，[34]，[35] 中被用来加强模型的泛化能力。Prakash等人进一步考虑了在随机放置物体进行数据生成时的场景结构 [30]，这使得神经网络能够学习在检测物体时利用上下文。Peng等人提出不仅要增强特征，还要增强标签 [58]。很容易看出，通过随机化，可以增加样本的多样性。但是随机化往往是随机的，这意味着可能存在一些无用的随机化操作，可以进一步移除以提高模型的效率。
b) Adversarial Data Augmentation: Adversarial data augmentation aims to guide the augmentation to optimize the generalization capability, by enhancing the diversity of data while assuring their reliability. Shankar et al. [37] used a Bayesian network to model dependence between label, domain and input instance, and proposed CrossGrad, a cautious data augmentation strategy that perturbs the input along the direction of greatest domain change while changing the class label as little as possible. Volpi et al. [38] proposed an iterative procedure that augments the source dataset with examples from a fictitious target domain that is "hard" under the current model, where adversarial examples are appended at each iteration to enable adaptive data augmentation. Zhou et al. [39] adversarially trained a transformation network for data augmentation instead of directly updating the inputs by gradient ascent while they adopted the regularization of weak and strong augmentation in [31], [170]. Adversarial data augmentation often has certain optimization goals that can be used by the network. However, its optimization process often involves adversarial training, thus is difficult.
b) 对抗性数据增强：对抗性数据增强旨在通过增强数据的多样性同时确保其可靠性，来指导增强以优化泛化能力。Shankar等人[37]使用贝叶斯网络来建模标签、领域和输入实例之间的依赖关系，并提出了CrossGrad，这是一种谨慎的数据增强策略，它在输入的最大领域变化方向上进行扰动，同时尽可能少地改变类标签。Volpi等人[38]提出了一种迭代过程，该过程通过将从虚构的目标领域中提取的示例添加到源数据集中来增强数据集，这个目标领域在当前模型下是“困难”的，在每个迭代中添加对抗性示例以实现自适应数据增强。Zhou等人[39]对抗性地训练了一个转换网络用于数据增强，而不是通过梯度上升直接更新输入，同时他们采用了[31]、[170]中的弱增强和强增强的正则化。对抗性数据增强通常具有某些可以被网络使用的优化目标。然而，其优化过程通常涉及对抗性训练，因此是困难的。
2) Data Generation-Based DG: Data generation is also a popular technique to generate diverse and rich data to boost the generalization capability of a model. Here,the function M(⋅) can be implemented using some generative models such as Variational Auto-encoder (VAE) [171], and Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) [172]. In addition, it can also be implemented using the Mixup [173] strategy.
2) 基于数据生成的DG：数据生成也是一种流行的技术，用于生成多样化和丰富的数据来提升模型的泛化能力。在这里，函数M(⋅)可以使用一些生成模型来实现，如变分自编码器（VAE）[171]和生成对抗网络（GAN）[172]。此外，它还可以通过使用Mixup[173]策略来实现。
Rahman et al. [56] used ComboGAN [174] to generate new data and then applied domain discrepancy measure such as MMD [175] to minimize the distribution divergence between real and generated images to help learn general representations. Qiao et al. [40] leveraged adversarial training to create "fictitious" yet "challenging" populations, where a Wasserstein Auto-Encoder (WAE) [176] was used to help generate samples that preserve the semantic and have large domain transportation. Zhou et al. [43] generated novel distributions under semantic consistency and then maximized the difference between source and the novel distributions. Somavarapu et al. [57] introduced a simple transformation based on image stylization to explore cross-source variability for better generalization, where AdaIN [177] was employed to achieve fast stylization to arbitrary styles. Different from others, Li et al. [52] used adversarial training to generate domains instead of samples. These methods are more complex since different generative models are involved and we should pay attention to the model capacity and computing cost.
Rahman等人[56]使用了ComboGAN[174]来生成新数据，然后应用了领域差异度量，如MMD[175]，以最小化真实图像与生成图像之间的分布差异，帮助学习通用表示。Qiao等人[40]利用对抗训练创建“虚构”但“具有挑战性”的群体，其中使用了Wasserstein自动编码器（WAE）[176]来帮助生成保持语义并具有较大领域传输的样本。Zhou等人[43]在语义一致性下生成新的分布，然后最大化源与新生成分布之间的差异。Somavarapu等人[57]引入了一种基于图像风格化的简单转换来探索跨源可变性，以便更好地泛化，其中使用了AdaIN[177]来实现快速风格化到任意风格。与其他方法不同，Li等人[52]使用对抗训练生成领域，而不是样本。这些方法更为复杂，因为涉及不同的生成模型，我们应该注意模型的容量和计算成本。
In addition to the above generative models, Mixup [173] is also a popular technique for data generation. Mixup generates new data by performing linear interpolation between any two instances and between their labels with a weight sampled from a Beta distribution, which does not require to train generative models. Recently, there are several methods using Mixup for DG, by either performing Mixup in the original space [47], [48], [54] to generate new samples; or in the feature space [49], [55], [148] which does not explicitly generate raw training samples. These methods achieved promising performance on popular benchmarks while remaining conceptually and computationally simple.
除了上述生成模型外，Mixup[173]也是一种流行的数据生成技术。Mixup通过在任意两个实例及其标签之间进行线性插值，并从Beta分布中采样权重来生成新数据，这不需要训练生成模型。最近，有一些方法使用Mixup进行领域泛化（DG），要么在原始空间[47]、[48]、[54]中执行Mixup来生成新样本；要么在特征空间[49]、[55]、[148]中执行，不显式生成原始训练样本。这些方法在流行的基准测试中取得了有希望的性能，同时保持了概念和计算上的简单性。

B. Representation Learning
B. 表示学习

Representation learning has always been the focus of machine learning for decades [178] and is also one of the keys to the success of domain generalization. We decompose the prediction function h as h=f∘g ,where g is a representation learning function and f is the classifier function. The goal of representation learning can be formulated as:
表示学习几十年来一直是机器学习的焦点 [178]，也是领域泛化成功的关键之一。我们将预测函数 h 分解为 h=f∘g，其中 g 是表示学习函数，f 是分类器函数。表示学习的目标可以表述为：
(14)minf,g⁡Ex,yℓ(f(g(x)),y)+λℓreg 
where ℓreg  denotes some regularization term and λ is the tradeoff parameter. Many methods are designed to better learn the feature extraction function g with corresponding ℓreg  . In this section, we categorize the existing literature on representation learning into two main categories based on different learning principles: domain-invariant representation learning and feature disentanglement.
其中 ℓreg  表示某些正则化项，λ 是权衡参数。许多方法被设计出来以更好地学习特征提取函数 g 及相应的 ℓreg 。在本节中，我们根据不同的学习原理，将现有的表示学习文献分为两个主要类别：领域不变表示学习和特征解耦。
1) Domain-Invariant Representation-Based DG: The work of [179] theoretically proved that if the feature representations remain invariant to different domains, the representations are general and transferable to different domains (also refer to Section III). Based on this theory, a plethora of algorithms have been proposed for domain adaptation. Similarly, for domain generalization, the goal is to reduce the representation discrepancy between multiple source domains in a specific feature space to be domain invariant so that the learned model can have a generalizable capability to the unseen domain. Along this line, there are mainly four types of methods: kernel-based methods, domain adversarial learning, explicit feature alignment, and invariant risk minimization.
1) 基于领域不变表示的领域泛化（DG）：[179] 的工作从理论上证明了如果特征表示对于不同领域保持不变，那么这些表示是通用的，并且可以迁移到不同的领域（也参见第三节）。基于这一理论，已经提出了大量用于领域适应的算法。同样地，对于领域泛化，目标是减少在特定特征空间中多个源领域之间的表示差异，使其领域不变，从而使学到的模型对未见领域具有泛化能力。沿着这条线，主要有四种方法：基于核的方法、领域对抗学习、显式特征对齐和不变风险最小化。
a) Kernel-Based Methods: Kernel-based method is one of the most classical learning paradigms in machine learning. Kernel-based machine learning relies on the kernel function to transform the original data into a high-dimensional feature space without ever computing the coordinates of the data in that space, but by simply computing the inner products between the samples of all pairs in the feature space. One of the most representative kernel-based methods is Support Vector Machine (SVM) [180]. For domain generalization, there are plenty of algorithms based on kernel methods, where the representation learning function g is implemented as some feature map ϕ(⋅) which is easily computed using kernel function k(⋅,⋅) such as RBF kernel and Laplacian kernel.
a) 基于核的方法：基于核的方法是机器学习中最为经典的学习范式之一。基于核的机器学习依赖于核函数，将原始数据变换到高维特征空间，而无需计算数据在该空间中的坐标，只需简单地计算特征空间中所有样本对之间的内积。最具有代表性的基于核的方法是支持向量机（SVM）[180]。在领域泛化中，有许多基于核方法的算法，其中表示学习函数 g 实现为某种特征映射 ϕ(⋅)，这种特征映射可以通过使用如径向基函数（RBF）核和拉普拉斯核等核函数 k(⋅,⋅) 来轻松计算。
Blanchard et al. [6] first used kernel method for domain generalization and extended it in [60]. They adopted the positive semi-definite kernel learning to learn a domain-invariant kernel from the training data. Grubinger et al. [61] adapted transfer component analysis (TCA) [181] to bridge the multi-domain distance to be closer for DG. Similar to the core idea of TCA, Domain-Invariant Component Analysis (DICA) [27] is one of the classic methods using kernel for DG. The goal of DICA is to find a feature transformation kernel k(⋅,⋅) that minimizes the distribution discrepancy between all data in feature space. Gan et al. [62] adopted a similar method as DICA and further added attribute regularization. In contrast to DICA which deals with the marginal distribution, Li et al. [63] learned a feature representation which has domain-invariant class conditional distribution. Scatter component analysis (SCA) [64] adopted Fisher's discriminant analysis to minimize the discrepancy of representations from the same class and the same domain, and maximize the discrepancy of representations from the different classes and different domains. Erfani et al. [65] proposed an Elliptical Summary Randomisation (ESRand) that comprises of a randomised kernel and elliptical data summarization. ESRand projected each domain into an ellipse to represent the domain information and then used some similarity metric to compute the distance. Hu et al. [66] proposed multi-domain discriminant analysis to perform class-wise kernel learning for DG, which is more fine-grained. To sum up, this category of methods is often highly related to other categories to act as their divergence measures or theoretical support.
Blanchard等人[6]首次使用核方法进行领域泛化，并在[60]中进行了扩展。他们采用正定半核学习从训练数据中学习一个领域不变核。Grubinger等人[61]将迁移成分分析（TCA）[181]应用于缩小多领域距离，以便DG更接近。与TCA的核心思想相似，领域不变成分分析（DICA）[27]是使用核进行DG的经典方法之一。DICA的目标是找到一个特征变换核k(⋅,⋅)，以最小化特征空间中所有数据的分布差异。Gan等人[62]采用了与DICA相似的方法，并进一步添加了属性正则化。与处理边缘分布的DICA不同，Li等人[63]学习了一个特征表示，该表示具有领域不变的条件类分布。散点成分分析（SCA）[64]采用Fisher判别分析来最小化同一类和同一领域中表示的差异，并最大化不同类和不同领域中表示的差异。Erfani等人[65]提出了一种椭圆形摘要随机化（ESRand），包括随机化核和椭圆形数据摘要。ESRand将每个领域投影到一个椭圆中来表示领域信息，然后使用某些相似度度量来计算距离。Hu等人[66]提出了多领域判别分析，用于DG的类wise核学习，这更为细致。总的来说，这类方法通常与其他类别高度相关，作为它们的发散度量或理论支持。
b) Domain Adversarial Learning: Domain-adversarial training is widely used for learning domain-invariant features. Ganin and Lempitsky [91] and Ganin et al. [92] proposed Domain-adversarial neural network (DANN) for domain adaptation, which adversarially trains the generator and discriminator. The discriminator is trained to distinguish the domains while the generator is trained to fool the discriminator to learn domain invariant feature representations. Li et al. [72] adopted such idea for DG. Gong et al. [93] used adversarial training by gradually reducing the domain discrepancy in a manifold space. Li et al. [94] proposed a conditional invariant adversarial network (CIAN) to learn class-wise adversarial networks for DG. Similar ideas were also used in [96], [99], [103]. Jia et al. [100] used single-side adversarial learning and asymmetric triplet loss to make sure only the real faces from different domains were indistinguishable, but not for the fake ones. After that, the extracted features of fake faces are more dispersed than before in the feature space and those of real ones are more aggregated, leading to a better generalized class boundary for unseen domains. In addition to adversarial domain classification, Zhao et al. [95] introduced additional entropy regularization by minimizing the KL divergence between the conditional distributions of different training domains to push the network to learn domain-invariant features. Some other GAN-based methods [45], [98], [102] were also proposed with theoretically guaranteed generalization bound.
b) 领域对抗学习：领域对抗训练被广泛用于学习领域不变特征。Ganin和Lempitsky [91]以及Ganin等人 [92]提出了领域对抗神经网络（DANN）用于领域适应，该网络通过对抗性训练生成器和判别器。判别器被训练用于区分领域，而生成器被训练用于欺骗判别器以学习领域不变特征表示。Li等人 [72]将这种思想应用于DG。Gong等人 [93]通过在流形空间中逐渐减少领域差异来进行对抗训练。Li等人 [94]提出了一种条件不变对抗网络（CIAN），用于学习DG的类对抗网络。类似的想法也在 [96]、[99]、[103] 中被使用。Jia等人 [100] 使用单侧对抗学习和不对称三元组损失，以确保只有来自不同领域的真实面部无法区分，而不是虚假的面部。之后，虚假面部的提取特征在特征空间中比之前更加分散，而真实面部的特征则更加聚集，从而为未见领域提供了更好的泛化类边界。除了对抗性领域分类，Zhao等人 [95] 通过最小化不同训练领域的条件分布之间的KL散度，引入额外的熵正则化，推动网络学习领域不变特征。还有一些其他基于GAN的方法 [45]、[98]、[102] 也被提出，并具有理论上保证的泛化边界。
c) Explicit Feature Alignment: This line of works aligns the features across source domains to learn domain-invariant representations through explicit feature distribution alignment [72], [182], [183], [184], or feature normalization [70], [185], [186], [187]. Motiian et al. [68] introduced a cross-domain contrastive loss for representation learning, where mapped domains are semantically aligned and yet maximally separated. Some methods explicitly minimized the feature distribution divergence by minimizing the maximum mean discrepancy (MMD) [181], [188], [189], [190], second order correlation [191], [192], [193], both mean and variance (moment matching) [183], Wasserstein distance [182], etc, of domains for either domain adaptation or domain generalization. Zhou et al. [182] aligned the marginal distribution of different source domains via optimal transport by minimizing the Wasserstein distance to achieve domain-invariant feature space.
c) 显式特征对齐：这一系列工作通过显式特征分布对齐 [72]、[182]、[183]、[184] 或特征归一化 [70]、[185]、[186]、[187] 来对源域之间的特征进行对齐，以学习域不变表示。Motiian 等人 [68] 为表示学习引入了跨域对比损失，其中映射域在语义对齐的同时实现最大分离。一些方法通过最小化最大均值差异（MMD）[181]、[188]、[189]、[190]、二阶相关 [191]、[192]、[193]，以及均值和方差（矩匹配）[183]、Wasserstein 距离 [182] 等域的特征分布差异，来实现域适应或域泛化。Zhou 等人 [182] 通过最小化 Wasserstein 距离，利用最优传输对齐不同源域的边缘分布，以实现域不变特征空间。
Moreover, there are some works that used feature normalization techniques to enhance domain generalization capability [185], [186]. Pan et al. [185] introduced Instance Normalization (IN) layers to CNNs to improve the generalization capability of models. IN has been extensively investigated in the field of image style transfer [177], [194], [195], where the style of an image is reflected by the IN parameters, i.e., mean and variance of each feature channel. Thus, IN layers [196] could be used to eliminate instance-specific style discrepancy to enhance generalization [185]. However, IN is task agnostic and may remove some discriminative information. In IBNNet, IN and Batch Normalization (BN) are utilized in parallel to preserve some discriminative information [185]. In [187], BN layers are replaced by Batch-Instance Normalization (BIN) layers, which adaptively balance BN and IN for each channel by selectively using BN and IN. Jin et al. [70], [71] proposed a Style Normalization and Restitution (SNR) module to simultaneously ensure both high generalization and discrimination capability of the networks. After the style normalization by IN, a restitution step is performed to distill task-relevant discriminative features from the residual (i.e., the difference between the original feature and the style normalized feature) and add them back to the network to ensure high discrimination. The idea of restitution is extended to other alignment-based method to restorate helpful discriminative information dropped by alignment [83]. Recently, Qi et al. [79] applied IN to unsupervised DG where there are no labels in the training domains to acquire invariant and transferable features. A combination of different normalization techniques is presented in [81] to show that adaptively learning the normalization technique can improve DG. This category of methods is more flexible and can be applied to other kind of categories.
此外，有一些工作使用了特征归一化技术来增强域泛化能力 [185]，[186]。Pan等人 [185] 在卷积神经网络（CNNs）中引入了实例归一化（IN）层，以提高模型的泛化能力。IN在图像风格转换领域 [177]，[194]，[195] 中已被广泛研究，其中图像的风格由IN参数（即每个特征通道的均值和方差）反映。因此，IN层 [196] 可用于消除实例特定风格的差异，以增强泛化 [185]。然而，IN与任务无关，可能会移除一些判别信息。在IBNNet中，IN和批量归一化（BN）并行使用，以保留一些判别信息 [185]。在 [187] 中，BN层被批量实例归一化（BIN）层取代，BIN层通过选择性地使用BN和IN，适应性地平衡 BN 和 IN 的每个通道。Jin等人 [70]，[71] 提出了一个风格归一化与恢复（SNR）模块，以同时确保网络的高泛化能力和判别能力。在IN进行风格归一化后，执行一步恢复，从残差（即原始特征与风格归一化特征之间的差异）中提取与任务相关的判别特征，并将其添加回网络，以确保高判别力。恢复的想法被扩展到其他基于对齐的方法，以恢复对齐过程中丢失的有用判别信息 [83]。最近，Qi等人 [79] 将IN应用于无监督的域泛化（DG），其中训练域中没有标签，以获取不变且可迁移的特征。在 [81] 中展示了不同归一化技术的组合，以表明自适应学习归一化技术可以改善DG。这类方法更加灵活，可以应用于其他种类的类别。
d) Invariant Risk Minimization (IRM): Arjovsky et al. [104] considered another perspective on the domain-invariance of representation for domain generalization. They did not seek to match the representation distribution of all domains, but to enforce the optimal classifier on top of the representation space to be the same across all domains. The intuition is that the ideal representation for prediction is the cause of y ,and the causal mechanism should not be affected by other factors/mechanisms, thus is domain-invariant. Formally, IRM can be formulated as:
d) 不变风险最小化（IRM）：Arjovsky等人[104]考虑了关于表示在域泛化中的域不变性的另一种观点。他们没有试图匹配所有域的表示分布，而是强制在表示空间顶部的最优分类器在所有域上都保持相同。直觉是，预测的理想表示是y的原因，并且因果机制不应受到其他因素/机制的影响，因此具有域不变性。正式地，IRM可以表述为：
(15)ming∈G,f∈⋂i=1M⁡arg⁡minf′∈F⁡ϵi(f′∘g)⁡∑i=1M⁡ϵi(f∘g)
for some function classes F of g and F of f . The constraint for f embodies the desideratum that all domains share the same representation-level classifier, and the objective function encourages f and g to achieve a low source domain risk. However,this problem is hard to solve as it involves an inner-level optimization problem in its constraint. The authors then develop a surrogate problem to learn the feature extractor g that is much more practical:
对于某些函数类别F的g和F的f。对于f的约束体现了所有域共享相同表示级别分类器的愿望，目标函数鼓励f和g实现源域的低风险。然而，由于约束中涉及内部级别的优化问题，这个问题很难解决。作者随后开发了一个替代问题来学习特征提取器g，这在实际中更为实用：
(16)ming∈G⁡∑i=1M⁡ϵi(g)+λ‖∇fϵi(f∘g)|f=1‖2,
where a dummy representation-level classifier f=1 is considered, and the gradient norm term measures the optimality of this classifier. The work also presents a generalization theory under a perhaps strong linear assumption, that for plenty enough source domains, the ground-truth invariant classifier can be identified.
其中考虑了一个虚拟的表示级别分类器f=1，梯度范数项衡量这个分类器的最优性。这项工作还提出了在可能较强的线性假设下的泛化理论，即对于足够多的源域，可以识别出地面真实的不变分类器。
IRM has gain notable visibility recently. There are some further theoretical analyses on the success [112] and failure cases of IRM [111], and IRM has been extended to other tasks including text classification [110] and reinforcement learning [197]. The idea to pursue the invariance of optimal representation-level classifier is also extended. Krueger et al. [106] promote this invariance by minimizing the extrapolated risk among source domains, which essentially minimizes the variance of source-domain risks. Mitrovic et al. [107] aim to learn such a representation in a self-supervised setup, where the second domain is constructed by data augmentation showing various semantic-irrelevant variations. Recently, Ahuja et al. [105] found the invariance of f alone is not sufficient. They found IRM still fails if g captures "fully informative invariant features",which makes y independent of x on all domains. This is particularly the case for classification (versus. regression) tasks. An information bottleneck regularization is hence introduced to maintain only partially informative features.
最近，IRM获得了显著的知名度。对IRM成功[112]和失败案例[111]进行了一些进一步的理论分析，并且IRM已经被扩展到其他任务，包括文本分类[110]和强化学习[197]。追求最优表示层分类器不变性的想法也得到了扩展。Krueger等人[106]通过最小化源域之间的外推风险来推动这种不变性，本质上是最小化源域风险的方差。Mitrovic等人[107]旨在在自监督设置中学习这样的表示，其中第二个域是通过数据增强显示各种语义不相关变化的构造。最近，Ahuja等人[105]发现仅f的不变性是不够的。他们发现，如果g捕获了“完全信息性的不变特征”，使得y在所有域上独立于x，那么IRM仍然会失败。这在分类（与回归）任务中尤其如此。因此，引入了信息瓶颈正则化，以保持只有部分信息性的特征。
2) Feature Disentanglement-Based DG: Disentangled representation learning aims to learn a function that maps a sample to a feature vector, which contains all the information about different factors of variation and each dimension (or a subset of dimensions) contains information about only some factor(s). Disentanglement based DG approaches in general decompose a feature representation into understandable compositions/sub-features, with one feature being domain-shared/invariant feature and the other domain-specific feature. The optimization objective of disentanglement-based DG can be summarized as:
2) 基于特征解耦的DG：解耦表示学习旨在学习一个函数，该函数将样本映射到一个特征向量，其中包含关于不同变化因素的所有信息，并且每个维度（或维度的子集）仅包含关于某些因素的信息。基于解耦的DG方法通常将特征表示分解为可理解的组合/子特征，其中一个特征是域共享/不变特征，另一个是域特定特征。基于解耦的DG的优化目标可以概括为：
(17)mingc,gs,f⁡Ex,yℓ(f(gc(x)),y)+λℓreg +μℓrecon ([gc(x),gs(x)],x),
where gc and gs denote the domain-shared and domain-specific feature representations,respectively. λ and μ are tradeoff parameters. The loss ℓreg  is a regularization term that explicitly encourages the separation of the domain shared and specific features and ℓrecon  denotes a reconstruction loss that prevents information loss. Note that [gc(x),gs(x)] denotes the combination of two kinds of features (which is not limited to concatenation operation).
其中 gc 和 gs 分别表示领域共享和领域特定的特征表示。λ 和 μ 是权衡参数。损失 ℓreg  是一个正则化项，它明确鼓励领域共享和特定特征的分离，而 ℓrecon  表示一个重建损失，以防止信息丢失。注意 [gc(x),gs(x)] 表示两种特征的组合（该组合不限于连接操作）。
Based on the choice of network structures and implementation mechanisms, disentanglement-based DG can mainly be categorized into three types: multi-component analysis, generative modeling, and causality-inspired methods.
根据网络结构和实现机制的选择，基于解耦的域泛化（DG）主要可以分为三种类型：多组件分析、生成模型和受因果启发的方法。
a) Multi-Component Analysis: In multi-component analysis, the domain-shared and domain-specific features are in general extracted using the domain-shared and domain-specific network parameters. The method of UndoBias [115] started from a SVM model to maximize interval classification on all training data for domain generalization. They represented the parameters of the i -th domain as wi=w0+Δi ,where w0 denotes the domain-shared parameters and Δi denotes the domain-specific parameters. Some other methods extented the idea of Undo-Bias from different aspects. Niu et al. [116] proposed to use multi-view learning for domain generalization. They proposed Multi-view DG (MVDG) to learn the combination of exemplar SVMs under different views for robust generalization. Ding and Fu [122] designed domain-specific networks for each domain and one shared domain-invariant network for all domains to learn disentangled representations, where low-rank reconstruction is adopted to align two types of networks in structured low-rank fashion. Li et al. [2] extended the idea of UndoBias into the neural network context and developed a low-rank parameterized CNN model for end-to-end training. Zunino et al. [123] learned disentangled representations through manually comparing the attention heat maps for certain areas from different domains. There are also other works that adopt multi-component analysis for disentanglement [113], [114], [117], [118], [119], [121], [198], [199], [200]. In general, multi-component analysis can be implemented in different architectures and remains effective for representation disentanglement.
a) 多组件分析：在多组件分析中，通常使用领域共享网络参数和领域特定网络参数来提取领域共享特征和领域特定特征。UndoBias [115] 方法从支持向量机（SVM）模型开始，旨在对所有训练数据执行区间分类以实现领域泛化。他们将第 i 个领域的参数表示为 wi=w0+Δi，其中 w0 表示领域共享参数，Δi 表示领域特定参数。其他一些方法从不同角度扩展了 Undo-Bias 的思想。Niu 等人 [116] 提出使用多视角学习进行领域泛化。他们提出了多视角领域泛化（MVDG），以学习不同视角下示例 SVM 的组合，实现鲁棒的泛化。Ding 和 Fu [122] 为每个领域设计了特定领域的网络，并为所有领域设计了一个共享的领域不变网络，以学习解耦表示，其中采用低秩重建将两种类型的网络以结构化的低秩方式对齐。Li 等人 [2] 将 UndoBias 的思想扩展到神经网络环境中，并开发了一种低秩参数化的卷积神经网络（CNN）模型进行端到端训练。Zunino 等人 [123] 通过手动比较来自不同领域的特定区域的注意力热图来学习解耦表示。还有其他工作采用了多组件分析进行解耦 [113]、[114]、[117]、[118]、[119]、[121]、[198]、[199]、[200]。总的来说，多组件分析可以在不同的架构中实现，并且对于表示解耦仍然有效。
b) Generative Modeling: Generative models can be used for disentanglement from the perspective of data generation process. This kind of methods tries to formulate the generative mechanism of the samples from the domain-level, sample-level, and label-level. Some works further disentangle the input into class-irrelevant features, which contain the information related to specific instance [201]. The Domain-invariant variational autoencoder (DIVA) [124] disentangled the features into domain information, category information, and other information, which is learned in the VAE framework. Peng et al. [125] disentangled the fine-grained domain information and category information that are learned in VAEs. Qiao et al. [40] also used VAE for disentanglement, where they proposed a Unified Feature Disentanglement Network (UFDN) that treated both data domains and image attributes of interest as latent factors to be disentangled. Similarly, Zhang et al. [126] disentangled the semantic and variational part of the samples. Similar spirits also include [129], [130]. Nam et al. [127] proposed to disentangle the style and other information using generative models that their method is both for domain adaptation and domain generalization. Generative models can not only improve OOD performance, but can also be used for generation tasks, which we believe is useful for many potential applications.
b) 生成建模：生成模型可以从数据生成过程的角度用于解耦。这类方法试图从领域级、样本级和标签级来构建样本的生成机制。一些工作进一步将输入解耦为与类别无关的特征，这些特征包含与特定实例相关的信息 [201]。领域不变变分自编码器（DIVA）[124]将特征解耦为领域信息、类别信息和其他信息，这些信息在VAE框架中学习。Peng等人[125]在VAE中解耦了细粒度的领域信息和类别信息。Qiao等人[40]也使用VAE进行解耦，他们提出了一个统一的特征解耦网络（UFDN），将数据领域和感兴趣的图像属性都视为要解耦的潜在因素。同样，Zhang等人[126]解耦了样本的语义部分和变分部分。类似的精神也包括[129]、[130]。Nam等人[127]提出使用生成模型解耦风格和其他信息，他们的方法既适用于领域自适应，也适用于领域泛化。生成模型不仅可以提高OOD性能，还可以用于生成任务，我们认为这对于许多潜在应用是有用的。
c) Causality-Inspired Methods: Causality is a finer description of variable relations beyond statistics (joint distribution). Causal relation gives information of how the system will behave under intervention, so it is naturally suitable for transfer learning tasks, since domain shift can be seen as an intervention. Particularly, under the causal consideration, the desired representation is the true cause of the label (e.g., object shape), so that prediction will not be affected by intervention on correlated but semantically irrelevant features (e.g., background, color, style). There are a number of works [202], [203], [204], [205] that exploited causality for domain adaptation.
c) 以因果关系启发的学习方法：因果关系是对变量关系超越统计学（联合分布）的更精细描述。因果关系提供了关于系统在干预下将如何行为的信息，因此它自然适用于迁移学习任务，因为域转移可以被视为一种干预。特别是，在因果考虑下，所期望的表征是标签（例如，物体形状）的真实原因，这样预测就不会受到对相关但语义上不相关特征（例如，背景、颜色、风格）的干预的影响。有许多研究 [202], [203], [204], [205] 利用因果关系进行域自适应。
For domain generalization, He et al. [136] reweighted input samples in a way to make the weighted correlation reflect causal effect. Zhang et al. [134] took Fourier features as the causing factors of images, and enforce the independence among these features. Using the additional data of object identity (it is a more detailed label than the class label), [206] enforced the conditional independence of the representation from domain index given the same object. When such object label is unavailable, [76] further learned an object feature based on labels in a separate stage. For single-source domain generalization, [107], [135] used data augmentation to present information of the causal factor. The augmentation operation is seen as producing outcomes under intervention on irrelevant features, which is implemented based on specific domain knowledge. There are also generative methods under the causal consideration. Zhang et al. [131] explicitly modeled a manipulation variable that causes domain shift, which may be unobserved. Liu et al. [132] leveraged causal invariance for single-source generalization, i.e., the invariance of the process of generating (x,y) data based on the factors,which is explained more general than inference invariance that existing methods implicitly rely on. The two factors are allowed correlated which is more realistic. They theoretically prove the identifiability of the causal factor is possible and the identification benefits generalization. Sun et al. [133] extended the method and theory to multiple source domains. With more informative data, the irrelevant factor is also identifiable.
对于领域泛化，He等人[136]通过重新加权输入样本的方式，使得加权相关反映因果关系。Zhang等人[134]将傅里叶特征视为图像的成因，并强制这些特征之间的独立性。使用对象身份的额外数据（它比类标签更详细的标签），[206]在给定相同对象的情况下，强制表示与领域索引的条件独立性。当此类对象标签不可用时，[76]进一步在单独的阶段基于标签学习对象特征。对于单一源领域泛化，[107]、[135]使用数据增强来呈现因果因素的信息。增强操作被视为在干预无关特征下产生结果，这是基于特定领域知识实现的。在因果考虑下的生成方法也有研究。Zhang等人[131]明确建模了一个导致领域变化的操作变量，这可能是未观察到的。Liu等人[132]利用因果不变性进行单一源泛化，即基于因素生成(x,y)数据的过程的不变性，这比现有方法隐式依赖的推理不变性更一般。这两个因素允许相关，这在实际中更加合理。他们从理论上证明了因果因素的可识别性是可能的，并且识别有利于泛化。Sun等人[133]将该方法理论扩展到多个源领域。随着更多信息的数据的出现，无关因素也可以被识别。

C. Learning Strategy
C. 学习策略

In addition to data manipulation and representation learning, DG was also studied in general machine learning paradigms, which is divided into several categories: ensemble learning-based DG, meta-learning-based DG, gradient operation-based DG, distributionally robust optimization-based DG, self-supervised learning-based DG, and other strategies.
除了数据操作和表示学习，领域泛化也在通用机器学习范式中进行了研究，它被分为几个类别：基于集成学习的DG，基于元学习的DG，基于梯度操作的DG，基于分布鲁棒优化的DG，基于自监督学习的DG，以及其他策略。
1) Ensemble Learning-Based DG: Ensemble learning usually combines multiple models, such as classifiers or experts, to enhance the power of models. For domain generalization, ensemble learning exploits the relationship between multiple source domains by using specific network architecture designs and training strategies to improve generalization. They assume that any sample can be regarded as an integrated sample of the multiple source domains, so the overall prediction result can be seen as the superposition of the multiple domain networks.
1) 基于集成学习的DG：集成学习通常结合多个模型，如分类器或专家，以增强模型的能力。对于领域泛化，集成学习通过使用特定的网络架构设计和训练策略来利用多个源领域之间的关系，以提高泛化能力。他们假设任何样本都可以被视为多个源领域的集成样本，因此总体预测结果可以看作是多个领域网络的叠加。
Mancini et al. [139] proposed to use learnable weights for aggregating the predictions from different source specific classifiers, where a domain predictor is used to predict the probability that a sample belongs to each domain (weights). Segù et al. [69] maintained domain-dependent batch normalization (BN) statistics and BN parameters for different source domains while all the other parameters were shared. In inference, the final prediction was a linear combination of the domain-dependent models with the combination weights inferred by measuring the distances between the instance normalization statistics of the test sample and the accumulated population statistics of each domain. The work of [137] proposed domain-specific layers of different source domains and learning the linear aggregation of these layers to represent a test sample. Zhou et al. [8] proposed Domain Adaptive Ensemble Learning (DAEL), where a DAEL model is composed of a CNN feature extractor shared across domains and multiple domain-specific classifier heads. Each classifier is an expert to its own domain and a non-expert to others. DAEL aims to learn these experts collaboratively, by teaching the non-experts with the expert so as to encourage the ensemble to learn how to handle data from unseen domains. There are also other works [138], [142]. Ensemble learning remains a powerful tool for DG since ensemble allows more diversity of models and features. However, one drawback of ensemble learning-based DG is maybe its computational resources as we need more space and computations for training and saving different models.
Mancini等人[139]提出使用可学习权重来聚合来自不同源特定分类器的预测，其中使用一个领域预测器来预测样本属于每个领域的概率（权重）。Segù等人[69]为不同的源领域维护了领域依赖的批量归一化（BN）统计和BN参数，而所有其他参数都是共享的。在推理过程中，最终预测是领域依赖模型的线性组合，其组合权重是通过测量测试样本的实例归一化统计与每个领域的累积人口统计之间的距离来推断的。工作[137]提出了不同源领域的特定层，并学习这些层的线性组合来表示测试样本。Zhou等人[8]提出了领域自适应集成学习（DAEL），其中DAEL模型由跨领域的共享CNN特征提取器和多个领域特定分类器头组成。每个分类器对其自己的领域是专家，对其他领域是非专家。DAEL旨在通过用专家教授非专家，共同学习这些专家，从而鼓励集成学习如何处理未见领域的数据。还有其他工作[138]，[142]。集成学习仍然是DG的强大工具，因为集成允许模型和特征的更多多样性。然而，基于集成学习的DG的一个缺点可能是其计算资源，因为我们需要更多的空间和计算来训练和保存不同的模型。
2) Meta-Learning-Based DG: The key idea of meta-learning is to learn a general model from multiple tasks by either optimization-based methods [207], metric-based learning [208], or model-based methods [209]. The idea of meta-learning has been exploited for domain generalization. They divide the data form multi-source domains into meta-train and meta-test sets to simulate domain shift. Denote θ the model parameters to be learned, meta-learning can be formulated as:
2) 基于元学习的DG：元学习的关键思想是通过基于优化的方法 [207]、基于度量的学习 [208] 或基于模型的方法 [209] 从多个任务中学习一个通用模型。元学习的思想已经被用于领域泛化。他们将来自多源域的数据划分为元训练集和元测试集以模拟领域转移。记 θ 为要学习的模型参数，元学习可以表述为：
θ∗=Learn(Smte;ϕ∗)
(18)=Learn(Smte;MetaLearn(Smtrn)),
where ϕ∗=MetaLearn(Smtrn) denotes the meta-learned parameters from the meta-train set Smtrn which is then used to learn the model parameters θ∗ on the meta-test set Smte . The two functions Learn(⋅) and MetaLearn(⋅) are to be designed and implemented by different meta-learning algorithms, which corresponds to a bi-level optimization problem. The gradient update can be formulated as:
其中 ϕ∗=MetaLearn(Smtrn) 表示从元训练集 Smtrn 中元学习得到的参数，然后用于在元测试集 Smte 上学习模型参数 θ∗ 。两个函数 Learn(⋅) 和 MetaLearn(⋅) 需要由不同的元学习算法设计和实现，这对应于一个双层优化问题。梯度更新可以表述为：
(19)θ=θ−α∂(ℓ(Smte;θ)+βℓ(Smtrn;ϕ))∂θ,
where η and β are learning rates for outer and inner loops, respectively.
其中 η 和 β 分别是外循环和内循环的学习率。
Finn et al. [207] proposed Model-agnostic meta-learning (MAML). Inspired by MAML, Li et al. [17] proposed MLDG (meta-learning for domain generalization) to use the meta-learning strategy for DG. MLDG splits the data from the source domains into meta-train and meta-test to simulate the domain shift situation to learn general representations. Balaji et al. [18] proposed to learn a meta regularizer (MetaReg) for the classifier. [19] proposed feature-critic training for the feature extractor by designing a meta optimizer. Dou et al. [143] used the similar idea of MLDG and additionally introduced two complementary losses to explicitly regularize the semantic structure of feature space. Du et al. [20] proposed an extended version of information bottleneck named Meta Variational Information Bottleneck (MetaVIB). They regularize the Kullback-Leibler (KL) divergence between distributions of latent encoding of the samples that have the same category from different domains and learn to generate weights by using stochastic neural networks. Recently, some works also adopted meta-learning for semi-supervised DG or discriminative DG [44], [144], [145], [147], [210]. Meta-learning is widely adopted in DG research and it can be incorporated into several paradigms such as disentanglement [198]. Meta-learning performs well on massive domains since meta-learning can seek transferable knowledge from multiple tasks.
Finn等人[207]提出了模型无关的元学习（MAML）。受到MAML的启发，Li等人[17]提出了MLDG（用于域泛化的元学习），以使用元学习策略进行域泛化（DG）。MLDG将源域的数据分为元训练和元测试，以模拟域偏移情况，学习通用表征。Balaji等人[18]提出学习一个元正则化器（MetaReg）用于分类器。[19]提出了特征评价训练方法，通过设计元优化器来训练特征提取器。Dou等人[143]使用了MLDG的类似想法，并额外引入了两个互补损失，以显式正则化特征空间的语义结构。Du等人[20]提出了信息瓶颈的扩展版本，名为Meta变分信息瓶颈（MetaVIB）。他们正则化了来自不同域的同一类样本的潜在编码分布之间的KL散度，并通过使用随机神经网络学习生成权重。近期，一些工作也采用了元学习用于半监督的DG或判别性DG[44]、[144]、[145]、[147]、[210]。元学习被广泛应用于DG研究，并且可以融入多种范例，例如解耦[198]。由于元学习可以从多个任务中寻求迁移性知识，因此在大量域上表现良好。
3) Gradient Operation-Based DG: Other than meta-learning and ensemble learning, several recent works consider using gradient information to force the network to learn generalized representations. Huang et al. [150] proposed a self-challenging training algorithm that aims to learn general representations by manipulating gradients. They iteratively discarded the dominant features activated on the training data, and forced the network to activate remaining features that correlate with labels. In this way, network can be forced to learn from more bad cases which will improve generalization ability. Shi et al. [151] proposed a gradient-matching scheme, where their assumption is that the gradient direction of two domains should be the same to enhance common representation learning. To this end, they proposed to maximize the gradient inner product (GIP) to align the gradient direction across domains. With this operation, the network can find weights such that the input-output correspondence is as close as possible across domains. GIP can be formulated as:
3) 基于梯度操作的DG：除了元学习和集成学习之外，一些近期的工作考虑使用梯度信息来强制网络学习泛化的表示。Huang等人[150]提出了一种自我挑战训练算法，旨在通过操作梯度来学习通用表示。他们迭代地丢弃在训练数据上激活的主要特征，并强制网络激活与标签相关的剩余特征。这样，网络可以被强制从更多的错误案例中学习，从而提高泛化能力。Shi等人[151]提出了一种梯度匹配方案，他们的假设是两个领域的梯度方向应该相同以增强通用表示学习。为此，他们提出最大化梯度内积（GIP）以对齐跨领域的梯度方向。通过这种操作，网络可以找到权重，使得输入-输出对应在跨领域时尽可能接近。GIP可以表示为：
(20)L=Lcls (Strain ;θ)−λ2M(M−1)∑i,ji≠j⁡Gi⋅Gj,
where Gi and Gj are gradient for two domains that can be calu-lated as G=E∂ℓ(x,y;θ)∂θ . The gradient-invariance was achieved by adding CORAL [192] loss between gradients in [152], while Tian et al. [153] maximized the neuron coverage of DNN with gradient similarity regularization between the original and the augmented samples.
其中 Gi 和 Gj 是两个领域的梯度，可以计算为 G=E∂ℓ(x,y;θ)∂θ 。梯度不变性是通过在[152]中添加CORAL[192]损失来实现的，而Tian等人[153]通过在原始样本和增强样本之间进行梯度相似性正则化来最大化深度神经网络的神经元覆盖率。
4) Distributionally Robust Optimization-Based DG: The goal of distributionally robust optimization (DRO) [211] is to learn a model at worst-case distribution scenario to hope it can generalize well to the test data, which shares similar goal as DG. To optimize the worst-case distribution scenario, Sagawa et al. [212] proposed a GroupDRO algorithm that requires explicit group annotation of the samples. Such annotation was later narrowed down to a small fraction of validation set in [154], where they formulated a two-stage weighting framework. Other researchers reduced the variance of training domain risks by risk extrapolation (VRex) [106] or reducing class-conditioned Wasserstein DRO [157]. Recently, Koh et al. [156] proposed the setting of subpopulation shift where they also applied DRO to this problem. Particularly, Du et al. [80] proposed AdaRNN, a similar algorithm to the spirit of DRO that did not require explicit group annotation; instead, they learned the worst-case distribution scenario by solving an optimization problem. To summarize, DRO focuses on the optimization process that can also be leveraged in DG research.
4) 基于分布鲁棒优化的DG：分布鲁棒优化（DRO）[211]的目标是在最坏情况下的分布场景中学习一个模型，希望它可以很好地泛化到测试数据上，这与DG的目标相似。为了优化最坏情况下的分布场景，Sagawa等人[212]提出了一个GroupDRO算法，该算法需要样本的显式分组注释。这种注释后来被缩小到验证集的一小部分[154]，在其中他们构建了一个两阶段加权框架。其他研究者通过风险外推（VRex）[106]或减少条件Wasserstein DRO [157]来降低训练域风险的变化。最近，Koh等人[156]提出了子人群偏移的设置，他们也将DRO应用于这个问题。特别是，Du等人[80]提出了AdaRNN，这是一种与DRO精神相似的算法，不需要显式的分组注释；相反，他们通过解决一个优化问题来学习最坏情况下的分布场景。总之，DRO专注于优化过程，该过程也可以在DG研究中利用。
5) Self-Supervised Learning-Based DG: Self-supervised learning (SSL) is a recently popular learning paradigm that builds self-supervised tasks from the large-scale unlabeled data [213]. Inspired by this, Carlucci et al. [158] introduced a self-supervision task of solving jigsaw puzzles to learn generalized representations. Apart from introducing new pretext tasks, contrastive learning is another popular paradigm of self-supervised learning, which was adopted in several recent works [159], [160], [161]. The core of contrastive learning is to perform unsupervised learning between positive and negative pairs. Note that self-supervised learning is a general paradigm that can be applied to any existing DG methods, especially unsupervised DG where there are no labels in training domains [79]. Another possible application of SSL-based DG is the pretraining of multi-domain data that trains powerful pretraining models while also handling domain shifts. However, a possible limitation of SSL-based DG maybe its computational efficiency and requirement of computing resources.
5) 基于自监督学习的DG：自监督学习（SSL）是一种近期流行的学习范式，它从大规模未标记数据中构建自监督任务 [213]。受到这一启发，Carlucci等人 [158] 引入了一种解决拼图游戏的自监督任务，以学习泛化表征。除了引入新的前置任务外，对比学习是另一种流行的自监督学习范式，它在几项近期工作中被采用 [159]、[160]、[161]。对比学习的核心是在正样本对和负样本对之间进行无监督学习。请注意，自监督学习是一种通用范式，可以应用于任何现有的DG方法，特别是无监督DG，其中训练域中没有标签 [79]。基于SSL的DG的另一个可能应用是对多域数据进行预训练，训练强大的预训练模型，同时处理域转移。然而，基于SSL的DG的一个可能限制可能是其计算效率和对计算资源的需求。
TABLE III
EXISTING RESEARCH AREAS OF DOMAIN GENERALIZATION
