6) Other Learning Strategy for DG: There are some other learning strategies for domain generalization. For instance, metric learning was adopted in [166] to explore better pair-wise distance for DG. Ryu et al. [162] used random forest to improve the generalization ability of convolutional neural networks (CNN). They sampled the triplets based on the probability mass function of the split results given by random forest, which is used for updating the CNN parameters by triplet loss. Other works [214], [215] adopted model calibration for DG, where they argued that the calibrated performance has a close relationship with OOD performance. Zhang et al. [164] followed the lottery ticket hyphothesis to design network substructures for DG, while Narayanan et al. [163] focused on the shape-invariant features. Additionally, Cha et al. [165] observed the flat minima is important to DG and they designed a simple stochastic weight averaging densely method to find the flat minima. Since DG is a general learning problem, there will be more works that uses other strategy in the future.
6) 领域泛化的其他学习策略：对于领域泛化存在一些其他的学习策略。例如，度量学习在文献[166]中被采用，以探索DG更好的成对距离。Ryu等人[162]使用随机森林来提高卷积神经网络（CNN）的泛化能力。他们基于随机森林给出的分割结果的概率质量函数来采样三元组，该三元组用于通过三元组损失更新CNN参数。其他工作[214]、[215]采用了模型校准用于DG，他们认为校准后的性能与OOD性能有密切关系。Zhang等人[164]遵循彩票假设来设计用于DG的网络子结构，而Narayanan等人[163]则专注于形状不变特征。另外，Cha等人[165]观察到平坦最小值对于DG很重要，他们设计了一种简单的随机权重平均密集方法来寻找平坦最小值。由于DG是一个通用的学习问题，未来将会有更多采用其他策略的工作出现。

V. Other Domain Generalization Research Areas
V. 领域泛化的其他研究领域

Most of the existing literature on domain generalization adopt the basic (traditional) definition of DG in Definition 2. There is some existing literature that extends such setting to new scenarios to push the frontiers of DG (ref. Table III). This section briefly discuss the existing DG research areas to give the readers a brief overview of this problem.
现有关于领域泛化的文献大多采用定义2中的基本（传统）DG定义。有一些现有文献将此类设置扩展到新的场景，以推动DG的边界（见表III）。本节简要讨论现有的DG研究领域，以给读者提供一个关于这个问题的简要概述。

A. Single-Source Domain Generalization
A. 单源领域泛化

Setting M=1 in Definition 2 gives single-source DG. Compared to traditional DG (M>1) ,single-source DG becomes more challenging since there are less diversity in training domains. Thus, the key to this problem is to generate novel domains using data generation techniques to increase the diversity and informativeness of training data. Several methods designed different generation strategies [40], [52], [58], [59], [81], [100], [135], [159], [216] for single-source DG in computer vision tasks. A recent work [80] studied this setting in time series data where there is usually one unified dataset by using min-max optimization. We expect more application areas can benefit from single-source DG.
在定义2中设置 M=1 可以得到单源域泛化（single-source DG）。与传统域泛化（DG）(M>1) 相比，单源域泛化更具挑战性，因为训练域的多样性较少。因此，这个问题的关键在于使用数据生成技术生成新颖的域，以增加训练数据的多样性和信息性。一些方法为计算机视觉任务中的单源域泛化设计了不同的生成策略 [40]，[52]，[58]，[59]，[81]，[100]，[135]，[159]，[216]。最近的一项工作 [80] 研究了时间序列数据中的这个设置，通常时间序列数据有一个统一的数据库，通过使用最小-最大优化。我们期望更多的应用领域可以从单源域泛化中受益。

B. Semi-Supervised Domain Generalization
B. 半监督域泛化

Compared to traditional DG, semi-supervised DG does not require the full labels of training domains. It is common to apply existing semi-supervised learning algorithms such as Fix-Match [220] and FlexMatch [221] to learn pseudo labels for the unlabeled samples. For instance, two recent works adopted the consistency regularization in semi-supervised learning [170], [217] for semi-supervised DG. It can be seen that this setting is more general than traditional DG and we expect there will be more works in this area.
与传统域泛化相比，半监督域泛化不需要训练域的完整标签。通常应用现有的半监督学习算法，如Fix-Match [220] 和FlexMatch [221]，来为未标记样本学习伪标签。例如，两项最近的工作在半监督域泛化中采用了半监督学习的一致性正则化 [170]，[217]。可以看出，这个设置比传统的域泛化更通用，我们期望这个领域会有更多的研究工作。

C. Federated Learning With Domain Generalization
C. 联邦学习与域泛化

Privacy and security of machine learning is becoming increasingly critical [222]. Mahajan et al. [223] firstly studied this problem and showed that if the features are stable, then the model is more robust to membership inference attack. In federated DG [224], [225], models do not access the raw training data; instead, they aggregate the parameters from different clients. Under this circumstance, the key is to design better aggregation scheme through generalization techniques [138], [218], [219]. Federated DG is more important in healthcare [226]. On the other hand, decentralized training is another possible solution [227]. However, similar privacy risks emerge when there is a need to update the model. Thus, we hope there could be more research.
机器学习的隐私和安全问题正变得越来越关键 [222]。Mahajan等人 [223] 首次研究了这个问题，并表明如果特征是稳定的，那么模型对成员推断攻击的鲁棒性更强。在联邦DG [224]，[225] 中，模型无法访问原始训练数据；相反，它们聚合来自不同客户端的参数。在这种情况下，关键是通过泛化技术 [138]，[218]，[219] 设计更好的聚合方案。联邦DG在医疗保健领域 [226] 更加重要。另一方面，去中心化训练是另一种可能的解决方案 [227]。然而，在需要更新模型时，也会出现类似的隐私风险。因此，我们希望有更多的研究。

D. Other DG Settings
D. 其他DG设置

There are also other settings in DG, such as open domain generalization [54] and unsupervised domain generalization [79]. Open DG shares the similar setting of universal domain adaptation where the training and test label spaces are not the same. Unsupervised DG assumes that all labels in the training domains are not accessible. As the environment gets more general and challenging, there will be other DG research areas aiming at solving certain limitations.
在DG中还有其他设置，例如开放域泛化 [54] 和无监督域泛化 [79]。开放DG与通用域适应具有相似的设置，其中训练和测试标签空间不相同。无监督DG假设训练域中的所有标签都不可访问。随着环境变得越来越通用和具有挑战性，将会有其他DG研究领域旨在解决某些局限性。

VI. Applications
VI. 应用

In this section, we discuss the popular tasks/applications for domain generalization (ref. Fig. 4).
在这一节中，我们讨论了域泛化的流行任务/应用（参见图4）。
High generalization ability is desired in various vision tasks. Many works investigate DG on classification. Some works also study DG for semantic segmentation [93], action recognition [114], [146], face anti-spoofing [96], person Re-ID [47], [83], street view recognition [40], video understanding [116], and image compression [228]. Medical analysis [120] is one of the important application areas for DG due to its nature of data scarcity and existence of domain gaps, with the tasks of tissue segmentation [143], Parkinson's disease recognition [27], activity recognition [65], chest X-ray recognition [76], [90], and EEG-based seizure detection [88].
在各种视觉任务中，高泛化能力是人们所期望的。许多研究探讨了在分类任务中的域泛化（DG）。也有一些研究将DG应用于语义分割[93]、动作识别[114]、[146]、人脸防伪[96]、行人重识别[47]、[83]、街景识别[40]、视频理解[116]和图像压缩[228]。由于医学分析[120]领域数据稀缺和域间隙的存在，它成为DG重要的应用领域之一，其任务包括组织分割[143]、帕金森病识别[27]、活动识别[65]、胸部X射线识别[76]、[90]和基于EEG的癫痫发作检测[88]。
Fig. 4. Several applications of domain generalization.
图4. 域泛化的一些应用。
Apart from those areas, DG is also useful in reinforcement learning of robot control [17], [49] to generalize to an unseen environment. Some work used DG to recognize speech utterance [37], [117], fault diagnosis [73], [74], [90], physics [89], brain-computer interface [86].
除了这些领域之外，DG在机器人控制的强化学习中也有用[17]、[49]，以泛化到未见过的环境。一些工作使用DG来识别语音表述[37]、[117]、故障诊断[73]、[74]、[90]、物理[89]、脑-机接口[86]。
In natural language processing, it is also common that training data comes from different domains with different distributions and DG techniques are helpful. Some work used domain generalization for sentiment classification on the Amazon Review dataset [18], [103]. Others used DG for semantic parsing [147], web page classification [45]. For instance, if we are given natural language data from multiple domains and want to learn a generalized model that predicts well on any new domain, we can use domain generalization to acquire domain-invariant representations.
在自然语言处理中，训练数据通常来自不同域且分布不同，DG技术是有帮助的。一些研究使用域泛化技术在Amazon Review数据集上进行情感分类[18]、[103]。其他研究将DG应用于语义解析[147]、网页分类[45]。例如，如果我们有多个域的自然语言数据，并希望学习一个能够在任何新域上预测良好的泛化模型，我们可以使用域泛化来获取域不变表示。
Moreover, DG techniques favor broad prospects in some applications, such as financial analysis, weather prediction, and logistics. For instance, Du et al. [80] tried to adopt DG to time series modeling. They first propose the temporal covariate shift problem that widely exists in time series data, then, they proposed an RNN-based model to solve this problem to align the hidden representations between any pair of training data that are from different domains. Their algorithm, the so-called AdaRNN, was applied to stock price prediction, weather prediction, and electric power consumption. Another example is [128], where they applied domain generalization to sensor-based human activity recognition. In their application, the activity data from different persons are from different distributions, resulting in severe model collapse when applied to new users. To resolve such problem, they developed a variational autoencoder-based network to learn the domain-invariant and domain-specific modules, thus achieving the disentanglement.
此外，领域泛化（DG）技术在某些应用中具有广泛的前景，例如金融分析、天气预报和物流。例如，Du等人[80]尝试将DG应用于时间序列建模。他们首先提出了时间协变量偏移问题，该问题在时间序列数据中广泛存在，然后，他们提出了一个基于RNN的模型来解决这个问题，以对齐来自不同领域的任意一对训练数据之间的隐藏表示。他们的算法，所谓的AdaRNN，被应用于股票价格预测、天气预报和电力消耗预测。另一个例子是[128]，在其中他们将领域泛化应用于基于传感器的行为识别。在他们的应用中，来自不同人的活动数据来自不同的分布，当应用于新用户时会导致模型严重崩溃。为了解决这个问题，他们开发了一个基于变分自编码器的网络来学习领域不变和领域特定模块，从而实现解耦。
In the future, we hope there can be more DG applications in other areas to tackle with the distributional shift that widely exists in different applications. Another important problem is the evaluation of DG algorithms without accessing the test distribution in reality. While we can use the test data for evaluation in research, we simply cannot do it for real applications. In this case, one possible approach would be performing meta-train and meta-test split for the original data for multiple times. In each time, one split can be regarded as the unseen test data while the other as the training data. We can call it the meta-cross-validation for DG in reality. At the same time, we also hope there could be more evaluation metrics. For more evaluation in research, please refer to the next section.
在未来，我们希望领域泛化（DG）技术能在其他领域有更多应用，以应对不同应用中广泛存在的分布偏移问题。另一个重要问题是，在现实中无法访问测试分布时如何评估DG算法。虽然我们可以在研究中使用测试数据进行评估，但在实际应用中我们无法这样做。在这种情况下，一个可能的方法是对原始数据进行多次元训练和元测试分割。每次分割中，一个分割可以被视为未见过的测试数据，而另一个分割则作为训练数据。我们可以称之为现实中的DG元交叉验证。同时，我们也希望有更多的评估指标。有关更多的研究评估，请参考下一节。

VII. Datasets, Evaluation, and Benchmark
VII. 数据集、评估和基准

In this section, we summarize the existing common datasets and model selection strategies for domain generalization. Then, we introduce the codebase, DeepDG, and demonstrate some observations from experiment conducted via it.
在本节中，我们总结了现有的常见数据集和领域泛化（DG）的模型选择策略。然后，我们介绍了代码库DeepDG，并通过实验展示了其中的一些观察结果。

A. Datasets
A. 数据集

Table IV offers an overview of several popular datasets. Among them, PACS [2], VLCS [230], and Office-Home [231] are three most popular datasets. For large-scale evaluation, Do-mainNet [233] and Wilds [156] (i.e., a collection of datasets in Table IV with '-wilds') are becoming popular.
表IV提供了几个流行数据集的概述。其中，PACS [2]、VLCS [230] 和 Office-Home [231] 是三个最受欢迎的数据集。对于大规模评估，Do-mainNet [233] 和 Wilds [156]（即表IV中带有'-wilds'的一组数据集）正变得越来越流行。
Besides the datasets mentioned above, there exists some other datasets for domain generalization with different tasks. The Graft-versus-host disease (GvHD) dataset [245] is also popular and is used to test several methods [6], [27] for the flow cytometry problem. This dataset was collected from 30 patients with sample sizes ranging from 1,000 to 10,000 . This is a time series classification dataset. Some works [29], [71], [93] applied domain generalization to semantic segmentation, where CityScape [246] and GTA5 [247] datasets were adopted as benchmark datasets. Some works applied DG to object detection, using the datasets of Cityscapes [246], GTA5 [247], Synthia [248] for investigation [71]. Some other works used public datasets or RandPerson [249] for person re-identification [70], [186], [250]. Some works [17], [49] used the OpenAI Gym [251] as the testbed to evaluate the performance of algorithms in reinforcement learning problems such as Cart-Pole and mountain car.
除了上述提到的数据集之外，还存在一些用于域泛化的其他数据集，这些数据集有不同的任务。移植物抗宿主病（GvHD）数据集 [245] 也非常受欢迎，用于测试几种方法 [6]、[27] 在流式细胞术问题上的效果。这个数据集是从30名患者中收集的，样本大小从1,000到10,000不等。这是一个时间序列分类数据集。一些工作 [29]、[71]、[93] 将域泛化应用于语义分割，其中CityScape [246] 和 GTA5 [247] 数据集被用作基准数据集。一些工作将DG应用于目标检测，使用Cityscapes [246]、GTA5 [247]、Synthia [248] 数据集进行研究 [71]。还有一些工作使用了公共数据集或RandPerson [249] 进行行人重识别 [70]、[186]、[250]。一些工作 [17]、[49] 使用OpenAI Gym [251] 作为测试平台，以评估算法在强化学习问题（如Cart-Pole和山地车）中的性能。
In addition to these widely used datasets, there are also other datasets used in existing literature. The Parkinson's telemonitor-ing dataset [252] is popular for predicting the clinician's motor and total UPDRS scoring of Parkinson's disease symptoms from voice measures. Some methods [27], [60], [61] used the data from several people as the training domains to learn models that generalize to unseen subjects.
除了这些广泛使用的数据集之外，现有文献中还使用了其他数据集。帕金森病远程监测数据集 [252] 在预测帕金森病症状的医生运动和总UPDRS评分方面很受欢迎，该评分是基于语音测量得出的。一些方法 [27]、[60]、[61] 使用来自几个人的数据作为训练领域，以学习能够泛化到未见过的受试者的模型。
It is worth noting that the datasets of domain generalization have some overlaps with domain adaptation. For instance, Office-31, Office-Caltech, Office-Home, and DomainNet are also widely used benchmarks for domain adaptation. Therefore, most domain adaptation datasets can be used for domain generalization benchmark in addition to those we discussed here. For example, Amazon Review dataset [253] is widely used in domain adaptation. It has four different domains on product review (DVDs, Kitchen appliance, Electronics and Books), which can also be used for domain generalization.
值得注意的是，领域泛化数据的集合同领域适应有一定的重合。例如，Office-31、Office-Caltech、Office-Home 和 DomainNet 也常被用作领域适应的基准。因此，除了我们在这里讨论的数据集之外，大多数领域适应数据集也可以用于领域泛化基准。例如，Amazon Review 数据集 [253] 在领域适应中得到了广泛应用。它包含四个不同的产品评论领域（DVDs、厨房电器、电子产品和书籍），这些也可以用于领域泛化。

B. Evaluation
B. 评估

To test domain generalization algorithm on a test domain, three strategies are proposed [87], namely, Test-domain validation set, Leave-one-domain-out cross-validation, and Training-domain validation set. Test-domain validation set utilizes parts of the target domain as validations. Although it can obtain the best performance in most circumstances for that validation and testing share the same distribution, there is often no access to targets when training, which means it cannot be adopted in real applications. Leave-one-domain-out is another strategy to choose the final model when training data contains multiple sources. It leaves one training source as the validation while treating the others as the training part. Obviously, when only a single source exists in the training data, it is no longer applicable. In addition, due to different distributions among sources and targets, final results rely heavily on the selections of validation, which makes final results unstable. The most common strategy for domain generalization is Training-domain validation set which is used in most existing work. In this strategy, each source is split into two parts, the training part and the validation part. All training parts are combined for training while all validation parts are combined for selecting the best model. Since there still exists divergences between the combined validation and the real unseen targets, this simple and most popular strategy cannot achieve the best performance for some time.
为了在测试域上测试域泛化算法，提出了三种策略 [87]，即测试域验证集、留一域出交叉验证和训练域验证集。测试域验证集利用目标域的部分数据进行验证。尽管在大多数情况下，由于验证和测试共享相同的分布，它可以获得最佳性能，但在训练时通常无法访问目标，这意味着它不能用于实际应用。留一域出是另一种在训练数据包含多个来源时选择最终模型的策略。它将一个训练来源作为验证集，而将其他来源作为训练部分。显然，当训练数据中只有一个来源时，它就不再适用。此外，由于源和目标之间的分布不同，最终结果严重依赖于验证的选择，这使得最终结果不稳定。域泛化中最常见的策略是训练域验证集，这是大多数现有工作中使用的策略。在这种策略中，每个来源被分为两部分：训练部分和验证部分。所有训练部分合并用于训练，所有验证部分合并用于选择最佳模型。由于组合验证与真实未见目标之间仍然存在差异，这种简单且最受欢迎的策略在某些情况下无法实现最佳性能。
We need to mention that there may exist other evaluation protocols for DG such as [167] since designing effective evaluation protocols is often consistent with the OOD performance. Currently, most of the works adopted the train-domain validation strategy which may not always generate good performance since the distribution of validation set is not the same as the new training data. On the other hand, using accuracy alone may not be sufficient to valid the model performance. We are looking forward to new evaluation metrics that can truly reflect the properties test distributions as much as possible in order to obtain better results.
我们需要提到，可能存在其他用于域泛化的评估协议，例如 [167]，因为设计有效的评估协议通常与OOD性能一致。目前，大多数工作采用了训练域验证策略，这并不总是能产生良好的性能，因为验证集的分布与新的训练数据不同。另一方面，仅使用准确度可能不足以验证模型性能。我们期待新的评估指标，它们能够尽可能真实地反映测试分布的特性，以获得更好的结果。

C. Benchmark
C. 基准

To test the performance of DG algorithms in a unified codebase, in this paper, we develop a new codebase for DG, named DeepDG [254], [255]. Compared to the existing Do-mainBed [87], DeepDG simplifies the data loading and model selection process, while also makes it possible to run all experiments in a single machine. DeepDG splits the whole process into a data preparation part, a model part, a core algorithm part, a program entry, and some other auxiliary functions. Each part can be freely modified by users without affecting other parts. Users can add their own algorithms or datasets to DeepDG and compare with some state-of-the-art methods fairly. The current public version of DeepDG is only for image classification and we offer supports for Office-31, PACS, VLCS, and Office-Home datasets. Currently, nine state-of-the-art methods are implemented under the same environment, and it covers all three groups, including Data manipulation (Mixup [173]), Representation learning (DDC [188], DANN [91], CORAL [191]), and Learning strategy (MLDG [17], RSC [150], GroupDRO [155], ANDMask [256]).
为了测试统一代码库中DG算法的性能，在本文中，我们开发了一个新的DG代码库，名为DeepDG [254]，[255]。与现有的DomainBed [87]相比，DeepDG简化了数据加载和模型选择过程，同时也使得所有实验可以在单台机器上运行成为可能。DeepDG将整个流程分为数据准备部分、模型部分、核心算法部分、程序入口和一些其他辅助功能。用户可以自由修改每个部分，而不会影响其他部分。用户可以将自己的算法或数据集添加到DeepDG中，并与一些最先进的方法进行公平比较。当前公开版本的DeepDG仅用于图像分类，我们支持Office-31、PACS、VLCS和Office-Home数据集。目前，在同一环境下实现了九种最先进的方法，涵盖了所有三个组别，包括数据操作（Mixup [173]）、表示学习（DDC [188]，DANN [91]，CORAL [191]）和学习策略（MLDG [17]，RSC [150]，GroupDRO [155]，ANDMask [256]）。
We conduct some experiments on the two most popular image classification datasets, PACS and Office-Home, with DeepDG and Table V shows the results. ResNet-18 is used as the base feature network. Training-domain validation set is used for selecting final models,and 20% of sources are for validation while the others are for training. From Table V, we observe more insightful conclusions. (1) The baseline method, ERM, has achieved acceptable results on both datasets. Some methods, such as DANN and ANDMask, even have worse performance. (2) Simple data augmentation method, Mixup, cannot obtain remarkable results. (3) CORAL has slight improvements on both datasets compared to ERM, which is consistent with results offered by DomainBed [87]. (4) RSC, a learning strategy, achieves the best performance on both datasets, but the improvements are unremarkable compared to ERM. The results indicate the benefits of domain generalization in different tasks.
我们在两个最受欢迎的图像分类数据集PACS和Office-Home上进行了某些实验，使用DeepDG，表V显示了结果。ResNet-18被用作基础特征网络。训练域验证集用于选择最终模型，源中的 20% 用于验证，而其他的用于训练。从表V中，我们可以观察到更有洞察力的结论。（1）基线方法ERM在两个数据集上都取得了可接受的结果。某些方法，如DANN和ANDMask，甚至表现更差。（2）简单数据增强方法Mixup无法获得显著结果。（3）与ERM相比，CORAL在两个数据集上都略有改进，这与DomainBed [87] 提供的结果一致。（4）学习策略RSC在两个数据集上取得了最佳性能，但与ERM相比，改进并不显著。结果表明在不同任务中域泛化的益处。

VIII. Discussion
VIII. 讨论

In this section, we summarize existing methods and then present several challenges for future.
在这一节中，我们总结了现有的方法，然后提出了未来的几个挑战。

A. Summary of Existing Literature
A. 现有文献总结

The quantity and diversity of training data are critical to a model's generalization ability. Many methods aim to enrich the training data with the data manipulation methods to achieve good performance. However, one issue of the data manipulation methods is that there is a lack of theoretical guarantee of the unbound risk of generalization. Therefore, it is important to develop theories for the manipulation-based methods which could further guide the data generation designs without violating ethical standards.
训练数据的质量和多样性对模型的泛化能力至关重要。许多方法旨在通过数据操作方法丰富训练数据以达到良好的性能。然而，数据操作方法的一个问题是缺乏对泛化无界风险的理论保证。因此，为基于操作的方法发展理论，这可以进一步指导不违反伦理标准的数据生成设计，是非常重要的。
Compared to data manipulation, representation learning has theoretical support in general [6], [102], [179]. Kernel-based methods are widely used in traditional methods while deep learning-based methods play a leading role in recent years. While domain adversarial training often achieves better performance in domain adaptation, in DG, we did not see significant results improvements from these adversarial methods. We think this is probably because the task is relatively easy. For the explicit distribution matching, more and more works tend to match the joint distributions rather than just match the marginal [6], [72] or conditional [63] distributions. Thus, it is more feasible to perform dynamic distribution matching [189], [190]. Both disentanglement and IRM methods have good motivations for generalization, while more efficient training strategy can be developed. There are several studies [257] that pointed out merely learning domain-invariant features are insufficient and representation smoothness should also be considered.
与数据操作相比，表示学习在一般性上有理论支持 [6]，[102]，[179]。基于核的方法在传统方法中被广泛使用，而基于深度学习的方法在近年来发挥着主导作用。虽然在领域适应中，领域对抗训练通常能够取得更好的性能，但在DG中，我们没有看到这些对抗方法带来显著的性能提升。我们认为这可能是由于任务相对简单。对于显式的分布匹配，越来越多的工作倾向于匹配联合分布，而不仅仅是匹配边缘 [6]，[72] 或条件 [63] 分布。因此，执行动态分布匹配 [189]，[190] 更为可行。解耦和IRM方法对于泛化有很好的动机，同时可以开发更有效的训练策略。有几项研究 [257] 指出，仅仅学习领域不变特征是不够的，还应该考虑表示的平滑性。
For learning strategy, there is a trend that many works used meta-learning for DG, where it requires to design better optimization strategies to utilize the rich information of different domains. In addition to deep networks, there are also some work [162] that used random forest for DG, and we hope more diverse methods will come.
对于学习策略，目前有一种趋势，许多工作使用元学习进行DG，这需要设计更好的优化策略来利用不同领域的丰富信息。除了深度网络外，还有一些工作 [162] 使用随机森林进行DG，我们希望有更多样的方法会出现。

B. Future Research Challenges
B. 未来研究挑战

1) Continuous Domain generalization: For many real applications, a system consumes streaming data with non-stationary statistics. In this case, it is of great importance to perform continuous domain generalization that efficiently updates DG models to overcome catastrophic forgetting and adapts to new data. While there are some domain adaptation methods focusing on continuous learning [258], there are only very few investigations on continuous DG [259] whenever this is favorable in real scenarios.
1) 连续领域泛化：对于许多实际应用，系统消费的流数据具有非定常统计特性。在这种情况下，执行连续领域泛化，有效地更新DG模型以克服灾难性遗忘并适应新数据，是非常重要的。尽管有一些领域适应方法专注于连续学习 [258]，但关于连续DG的研究非常少 [259]，这在实际场景中是有利的。
2) Domain Generalization to Novel Categories: The existing DG algorithms usually assume the label space for different domains are the same. A more practical and general setting is to support the generalization on new categories, i.e., both domain and task generalization. This is conceptually similar to the goal of meta-learning and zero-shot learning. Some work [85], [260] proposed zero-shot DG and we expect more work to come in this area. There are some prior work [54], [261] that tried to use the boundary-based learning paradigms or consistency regularization to solve this problem, which are good approaches that future work might build methods upon them.
2) 领域泛化到新颖类别：现有的DG算法通常假设不同领域的标签空间是相同的。一个更实际和通用的设置是支持在新类别上的泛化，即领域和任务的泛化。这在概念上与元学习和零样本学习的目标相似。一些工作 [85]，[260] 提出了零样本DG，我们期望这个领域会有更多的工作出现。还有一些先前的工作 [54]，[261] 试图使用基于边界的 学习范式或一致性正则化来解决这个问题，这些是很好的方法，未来的工作可能会在这些方法基础上构建。
3) Interpretable Domain Generalization: Disentanglement-based DG methods decompose a feature into domain-invariant/shared and domain-specific parts, which provide some interpretation to DG. For other categories of methods, there is still a lack of deep understanding of the semantics or characteristics of learned features in DG models. For example, how to relate the results of the approach with the input feature space. How close are current methods to provide this level of interpretability? Causality [132] may be one promising tool to understand domain generalization networks and provide interpretations.
3) 可解释领域泛化：基于分离的DG方法将特征分解为领域不变/共享部分和领域特定部分，这为DG提供了一些解释。对于其他类别的方 法，仍然缺乏对DG模型中学习到的特征的语义或特性的深入了解。例如，如何将方法的结果与输入特征空间联系起来。当前的方法离提供这种解释水平有多远？因果性 [132] 可能是理解领域泛化网络并提供解释的一个有前景的工具。
4) Large-Scale Pre-Training/Self-Learning and DG: In recent years, we have witnessed the rapid development of large-scale pre-training/self-learning, such as BERT [262], GPT- 3 [263], and Wav2vec [264]. Pre-training on large-scale dataset and then finetuning the model to downstream tasks could improve its performance, where pre-training is beneficial to learn general representations. Therefore, how to design useful and efficient DG methods to help large-scale pre-training/self-learning is worth investigating.
4) 大规模预训练/自学习与DG：近年来，我们见证了大规模预训练/自学习的快速发展，如BERT [262]、GPT-3 [263] 和Wav2vec [264]。在大规模数据集上进行预训练，然后对模型进行下游任务的微调可以提高其性能，其中预训练有助于学习通用表示。因此，如何设计有用且高效的DG方法来帮助大规模预训练/自学习是值得研究的。
5) Test-Time Generalization: While DG focuses on the training phase, we can also request test-time generalization in inference phase. This further bridges domain adaptation and domain generalization since we can also use the inference unlabeled data for adaptation. Very few recent works [265], [266] paid attention to this setting. Compared to traditional DG, test-time generalization will allow more flexibility in inference time, while it requires less computation and more efficiency as there are often limited resources in inference-end devices.
5) 测试时泛化：虽然DG专注于训练阶段，我们也可以要求在推理阶段的测试时泛化。这进一步桥接了域自适应和域泛化，因为我们可以使用推理阶段的未标记数据来进行自适应。最近很少有工作 [265], [266] 关注这个设置。与传统DG相比，测试时泛化将在推理时间提供更大的灵活性，同时由于推理端设备通常资源有限，它需要更少的计算和更高的效率。
6) Performance Evaluation for DG: The recent work [87] pointed out that on several datasets, the performance of some DG methods is almost the same as the baseline (i.e., ERM). We do not take it as the full evidence that DG is not useful in real applications. Instead, we argue that this might be due to the inappropriate evaluation schemes in use today, or the domain gaps not being so large. In more realistic situations such as person ReID where there are obvious domain gaps [71], the improvement of DG is dramatic. Therefore, we stay positive about the value of DG and hope researchers can also find more suitable settings and datasets for the study.
6) DG的性能评估：最近的工作 [87] 指出，在几个数据集上，某些DG方法的性能几乎与基线（即ERM）相同。我们并不认为这是DG在真实应用中无用的充分证据。相反，我们认为这可能是由于目前使用的评估方案不合适，或者域差距不够大。在诸如人员重识别（person ReID）等更现实的场景中，存在明显的域差距 [71]，DG的改进是显著的。因此，我们对DG的价值持乐观态度，并希望研究人员能够找到更适合的设置和数据集进行研究。

IX. Conclusion
IX. 结论

Generalization has always been an important research topic in machine learning research. In this paper, we review the domain generalization areas by providing in-depth analysis of theories, existing methods, datasets, benchmarks, and applications. Then, we thoroughly analyze the methods. Based on our analysis, we provide several potential research challenges that could be the directions of future research. We hope that this survey can provide useful insights to researchers and inspire more progress in the future.
泛化一直是机器学习研究中的重要研究主题。在本文中，我们通过提供对理论、现有方法、数据集、基准和应用的深入分析，回顾了域泛化的领域。然后，我们彻底分析了这些方法。基于我们的分析，我们提出了几个可能的研究挑战，它们可能是未来研究的方向。我们希望这份调查能为研究人员提供有用的见解，并激发未来的更多进展。

His research interests include artificial intelligence, pervasive computing, and human-computer interaction.
陈毅强（IEEE高级会员）在1996年和1999年分别在中国湖南湘潭大学获得了计算机科学学士和硕士学位，2003年在中国科学院计算技术研究所获得了计算机科学博士学位。2004年，他是香港科技大学计算机科学系的访问学者研究员。他目前是中国科学院计算技术研究所（ICT）的普适计算研究中心教授和主任。他的研究领域包括人工智能、普适计算和人机交互。
Wenjun Zeng (Fellow, IEEE) received the BE degree from Tsinghua University, the MS degree from the University of Notre Dame, and the PhD degree from Princeton University. He is a senior principal research manager and a member of the Senior Leadership Team, Microsoft Research Asia. He was with the University of Missouri from 2003 to 2016, most recently as a full professor. Prior to that, he worked for PacketVideo Corp., Sharp Labs of America, Bell Labs, and Panasonic Technology. He has contributed significantly to the development of international standards (ISO MPEG, JPEG2000, and OMA). His current research interests include mobile-cloud media computing, computer vision, and multimedia communications and security. He is on the editorial board of the International Journal of Computer Vision. He was an AE of the IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems for Video Technology, IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security, and IEEE Transactions on Multimedia (TMM). He was on the Steering Committee of the IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing and IEEE Transactions on Multimedia. He served as the Steering Committee chair of IEEE ICME in 2010 and 2011, and has served as the general chair or TPC chair for several IEEE conferences (e.g., ICME'18, ICIP'17). He was the recipient of several best paper awards.
汪俊增（IEEE会士）在清华大学获得学士学位，在圣母大学获得硕士学位，在普林斯顿大学获得博士学位。他是微软亚洲研究院的高级首席研究经理和高级领导团队成员。他在2003年至2016年间在密苏里大学工作，最近担任全职教授。在此之前，他曾在PacketVideo Corp.、美国夏普实验室、贝尔实验室和松下技术公司工作。他为国际标准（ISO MPEG、JPEG2000和OMA）的发展做出了重大贡献。他目前的研究兴趣包括移动-云媒体计算、计算机视觉以及多媒体通信和安全。他是《国际计算机视觉杂志》的编辑委员会成员。他曾担任IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems for Video Technology、IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security以及IEEE Transactions on Multimedia (TMM) 的副编辑。他曾担任IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing和IEEE Transactions on Multimedia的指导委员会成员。他曾在2010年和2011年担任IEEE ICME的指导委员会主席，并曾担任多个IEEE会议（例如ICME'18、ICIP'17）的总主席或技术程序委员会主席。他曾获得多项最佳论文奖。
Philip S. Yu (Fellow, IEEE) received the BS degree in electrical engineering from the National Taiwan University, the MS and PhD degrees in electrical engineering from Stanford University, and the MBA degree from New York University. He is a distinguished professor in computer science with the University of Illinois at Chicago and also holds the Wexler chair in information technology. His research interests include big data, including data mining, data stream, database, and privacy. He has published more than 1,000 papers in refereed journals and conferences. He holds or has applied for more than 300 US patents. He is the recipient of the ACM SIGKDD 2016 Innovation Award for his influential research and scientific contributions on mining, fusion, and anonymization of big data, the IEEE Computer Society's 2013 Technical Achievement Award for pioneering and fundamentally innovative contributions to the scalable indexing, querying, searching, mining, and anonymization of big data, and the Research Contributions Award from IEEE ICDM in 2003 for his pioneering contributions to the field of data mining. He also received the ICDM 2013 10-year Highest-Impact Paper Award, and the EDBT Test of Time Award (2014). He was the editor-in-chief of the ACM Transactions on Knowledge Discovery from Data (2011-2017) and the IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (2001-2004). He is a fellow of the ACM.
Philip S. Yu（IEEE会士）获得了台湾大学电机工程学士学位、斯坦福大学电机工程硕士和博士学位，以及纽约大学工商管理硕士学位。他是伊利诺伊大学芝加哥分校计算机科学的杰出教授，并担任信息技术Wexler讲座教授。他的研究兴趣包括大数据领域，涉及数据挖掘、数据流、数据库和隐私。他在同行评审的期刊和会议上发表了1000多篇论文。他拥有或申请了300多项美国专利。由于他在大数据挖掘、融合和匿名化领域具有影响力的研究和科学贡献，他获得了2016年ACM SIGKDD创新奖；由于他在大数据的可扩展索引、查询、搜索、挖掘和匿名化方面的开创性和根本性创新贡献，他获得了2013年IEEE计算机学会技术成就奖；以及2003年IEEE ICDM研究贡献奖，以表彰他在数据挖掘领域的开创性贡献。他还获得了2013年ICDM 10年最高影响力论文奖，以及2014年EDBT时效测试奖。他曾担任《ACM Transactions on Knowledge Discovery from Data》（2011-2017）的主编和《IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering》（2001-2004）的主编。他是ACM的会士。
